关键点：
Key Points:
创建2轴刀路的常规工作流
General Workflow to Create 2X Toolpaths
CAM 用户界面和配置
CAM UI and Configuration
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
中望3D是一个集成的CAD/CAM解决方案，它提供了涵盖产品开发整个过程的各种工具。这使用户能够从数字线程到车间操作的更高效的工作流。

ZW3D is an integrated CAD/CAM solution, which provides various tools covering the whole process of product development. This enables users a more productive workflow from digital threads to shop floor operations.
注意：本教程是基于中望3D 2024版本，某些功能或图标可能与当前版本不匹配。
Notes: This tutorial is based on version ZW3D 2024, some functions or icons may not match the current version.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
创建2轴加工刀路的常规步骤如下：
The general workflow to create 2X toolpaths is as follows:
创建2轴加工刀路的常规步骤
General Steps to Create 2X Machining Toolpaths
步骤 01 在CAD模块设计好模型或者导入一个外部几何体。
STEP 01 Design model in CAD module or import an external geometry.
步骤 02 将模型放置在一个适合的加工方向。
STEP 02 Align the model to a proper direction for machining.
步骤 03 进入CAM模块。
STEP 03 Go to CAM module.
步骤 04 添加坯料。
STEP 04 Add a stock.
步骤 05 分析和测量模型的关键特性，以帮助选择正确的策略。
STEP 05 Analyze and measure the key features of the model to help choose a correct strategy.
步骤 06 选择一个工序，定义CAM特征，选择一把刀然后设置合适的参数计算刀路。
STEP 06 Select an operation, define CAM features, pick a tool and then calculate toolpaths with suitable parameters.
步骤 07 定义机床和控机制参数。
STEP 07 Define machine and controller parameters.
步骤 08 输出NC代码到文件。
STEP 08 Post process NC code to file.

下图展示了打开文件时，中望3D CAM窗口的典型布局。
The following figure shows the typical layout of ZW3D CAM window when a file is opened.
界面布局
Interface Layout
Ribbon：所有创建刀路需要用到的功能都在Ribbon栏上。用户可以通过每个按钮的名字推断它的功能。后面会详细介绍2轴加工的Ribbon栏。

Ribbon: All the functions in need to create toolpath are included in Ribbon Bar. Users can infer the function of every button from its name. And a detail introduction of Ribbons used in 2X machining will be provided later.
CAM 管理器：用户可以在这里控制和查看整个加工流程。下一章会详细介绍CAM管理器。
CAM Manager: Users can control and review the whole machining workflow here. It will be shown in detail in the next chapter.
DA工具栏：有许多有用的工具在此工具栏上，例如退出，属性过滤器，显示模式等。
Document Aware Toolbar: There are many useful tools in this area, like Exit, picking filter, display settings, etc.
图形区域：这个区域显示几何体以及刀路。
Graphic Window: This is the place where the geometry and toolpaths are shown.

用户可以通过点击Ribbon栏空白处，自定义界面。如下图所示，用户可以重新排列功能区位置、修改热键设置或重新定义鼠标操作。

Users can also right-click on the blank area of Ribbon to customize the most interface. As the figure shows below, users can rearrange the Ribbon locations, modify Hotkey settings, or redefine mouse actions.
自定义Ribbon栏
Customize Ribbon

当你想为一个零件创建刀路时，CAM管理器将会非常有用。作为初学者，您最好从上到下遵循CAM管理器中的步骤列表。下图显示了CAM管理器的主要结构。

CAM Manager is the most useful place when you are trying to generate toolpaths for a part. As a beginner, you’d better follow the steps list in CAM Manager from top to down. The figure below shows the main structure of the CAM Manager.
CAM管理器
CAM Manager

用户可以右键单击图标加工设置1或CAM管理器中的任何文本来自定义菜单。
Users can right-click on the icon Setup or any text in CAM Manager to customize it.
自定义管理器
Customize Manager
双击正确的位置
Double-click on the right place
双击管理器树的文本或其前面的小图标，结果会有所不同。双击图标将隐藏或显示工具路径，双击文字将进入工序参数窗口。右键单击文字将打开菜单。

Double-click on the text of the Manager Tree or the small icon in front of it is different in results. Double-click on the icon will hide or display the toolpath, but on the text will bring you to Parameters window. Right-click on the text will open the context menu.

关键点：
Key Points:
准备零件和坯料
Prepare Part and Stock
创建2轴铣削工序
Create 2X Milling Operations
创建和仿真刀路
Generate & Verify Toolpaths
输出NC文件
Output NC Files

在开始创建刀具路径之前，您需要一个零件、一个坯料和一个粗略的分析来帮助您获得一个初步的加工计划。
You need a part, a stock and a rough analysis to help you get a preliminary machining plan before you start to create toolpaths.
本章使用与前面相同的模型。
This chapter uses the same model as previous.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
步骤 01 在CAD模块中打开一个零件文件。
STEP 01 Open the part file in CAD Module.
在CAD模块打开零件
Open a Part in CAD Module
步骤 02 根据您的机器，将模型与合适的坐标系对齐。通常原点位于模型的一个角点或图形中心。用户可以使用“移动”命令完成此操作。在这个案例中，坐标已经设置为正确的位置。

STEP 02 Align the model with a proper coordinate system according to your machine. Normally the origin locates on one of the corners or the graphic center of the model. Users can do this with the help of the Move  command. In this case, the coordinate is already set to right place.

在零件准备好之后，进入CAM模块后第一件事情就是添加一个坯料。中望3D提供了两种方式去创建坯料。
After the part is ready, the first thing after going into the CAM module is to add a stock. ZW3D provides 2 methods to create a stock.
方法1：点击Ribbon栏添加坯料按钮，根据几何体尺寸创建规则的坯料，如下图所示。
Method1: Click on Ribbon Add a stock to create a regular stock according to the geometry size of the part, as the figure shows below.
通过Ribbon栏创建坯料
Create a Stock with Ribbon
步骤 01 点击添加坯料。
STEP 01 Click on Add a Stock.
步骤 02 选择一个坯料类型。可以是一个六面体，圆柱体或者是外部的STL造型。
STEP 02 Select a form for the stock. It can be a block, cylinder or external STL shape.
造型：选择添加坯料的造型。
Shapes: Select the geometry to enclose.
平面：选择一个参照平明以确定坯料的方向。如果为空，则参考平面与XY平行。
Plane: Select a reference plane to orient the stock. If blank, the reference plane is parallel to XY.
步骤 03 定义坯料的尺寸。
STEP 03 Define the dimensions of the stock.
方法2：插入一个几何体作为坯料。几何体可以来自同一个Z3文件的不同对象，也可以来自外部文件。
Method2: Insert a geometry as a stock. The geometry may come from another object in the same Z3 file or an external file.
步骤 01 点击Ribbon栏几何体调出实体浏览器窗口，然后选择要作为坯料插入的几何体。或者您也可以右键单击CAM管理器树中的几何体 调出实体浏览器窗口。

STEP 01 Click on Ribbon Geometry to call out Shape Brower window, then select the geometry you want to insert as a stock. Or you can also right-click on Geometry text in CAM Manager tree to get access to the same place.
通过插入几何体创建坯料
Create a Stock by Inserting a Geometry
步骤 02 把插入的几何体设置为坯料类别。
STEP 02 Set the inserted geometry as a stock.
把插入的几何体设置为坯料类别
Set the Inserted Geometry as A Stock
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
对零件进行初步分析和测量对用户很重要，包括零件材料，圆角半径，孔直径，关键特征和其他参数，这些参数有助于决定刀具或者工序。您可以参考的工具如下图所示，您也可以在CAD坏境执行此操作。

It is important to users to do a preliminary analysis and measurement on the part, including part material, the corner radius, hole diameters, key features and other parameters which may help decide the cutter or operation plan. The tools you may refer to are shown below, you can also do this step in CAD Level.
有用的分析和测量工具
Useful Tools for Analysis and Measurement
下面是一个列表，帮助您了解如何使用查询选项卡中的工具。
Here is a list to help you understand how to use the tools in the Inquire tab.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
中望3D提供了多种类型的工序，本教程将逐一介绍所有工序。
ZW3D provides various types of operations, this tutorial will take a brief overview of all the options one by one.
2轴铣削工序
Operations for 2X Milling
2轴铣削：通过这个命令，用户可以为整个零件一键创建一系列基于2轴工序的智能规则。中望3D将此类功能命名为策略。在3轴、5轴和钻孔模块中可以找到类似功能。

Mill2: With this command, users can create a series of “intelligent” rule-based 2X operations for the whole part by one click. ZW3D names such function as “Tactics”. Similar ones can also be found in 3X, 5X and Drill module.
2轴铣削策略刀轨
Mill2 Tactic Toolpaths
螺旋切削工序：螺旋切削工序是一种平面铣（区域清理）或型腔铣技术，在每一个不同深度推进刀具远离或朝向零件边界  。
Spiral: This operation is a facing or pocketing technique, which advances the tool at each depth by proceeding toward or away from the part boundaries.
螺旋切削工序刀轨
Spiral Operation Toolpaths
Z字型平行切削工序：Z字型切削工序是一种平面铣（区域清理）或型腔铣技术。 该技术通过一系列的直线平行切削方式，在每一深度推进刀具，且在每次切削尾端反向刀具方向。
Zigzag: This operation is a facing or pocketing technique, which advances the tool at each depth through a sequence of straight parallel cuts, reversing direction at the end of each cut.
Z字型平行切削工序刀轨
Zigzag Operation Toolpaths
单向平行切削工序：单向平行切削是一种平面铣（区域清理）或型腔铣技术，除切削均在同一方向外，与Z字型切削相似。每切削一次，刀具提升一次。
Box: This operation is a facing or pocketing technique, similar to the zigzag cut except the cuts are all in the same direction. The tool is lifted between each cut.
单向平行切削工序刀轨
Box Operation Toolpaths
等高外形切削工序：在等高外形切削工序中，对每一切削区域，计算中间曲线或脊线。刀具以平行或垂直于该曲线的方向运动。
Countour: This operation will generate a toolpath parallel or perpendicular to the reference curve (medial or spine) for each cutting zone.
等高外形切削工序刀轨
Contour Operation Toolpaths
轮廓切削工序：执行轮廓切削工序时，对任意数量的开放或闭合曲线边界（CAM轮廓特征）或包含几何体轮廓的CAM组件进行切削。只要刀具位置参数设置为在边界上，同样支持自相交轮廓。
Profile: This operation cuts any number of open or closed curve boundaries (CAM Profile features) or CAM Components containing geometry profiles.
轮廓切削工序刀轨
Profile Operation Toolpaths
斜面切削工序：对于孔特征，斜面切削工序创建的刀轨与螺线切削工序创建的刀轨相似。
Ramp: The toolpath created by the Ramp Cut operation is similar to the toolpath created by Helical Cut operation for a hole feature.
斜面切削工序刀轨
Ramp Operation Toolpaths
排料切削工序：零件排料工序会将零件最大数量的排放到材料上。
Nesting: This operation is used to arrange parts on a plate of material to maximize the number of parts that will fit.
倒角/圆角切削工序: 这两个工序是用于加工倒角和圆角。
Chamfer/Corner Round: This operation is used to cut chamfer or fillet.
倒角切削工序刀轨（圆角切削工序类似）
Chamfer Operation Toolpaths (Corner Round is similar)
螺线切削工序：螺线切削工序用于加工公螺纹和母螺纹。
Helical: This operation is used to machine male and female threads.
顶面切削工序：顶面切削工序可用于切削顶部的坯料或所有的平面。
Topface Cut: This operation is used to get a planar face on the top of the whole part or some planar faces of the part.
顶面切削工序刀轨
Topface Operation Toolpaths (Corner Round is similar)
轨迹连接工序：轨迹连接工序用于刀轨之间创建安全连接刀轨。
Inter Path Move: This operation is to create safe links between tool paths.
轨迹连接工序刀轨
Inter Path Move Operation Toolpaths

下图展示了中望3D中所有CAM特征的类型。这一节将会拿轮廓特征作为例子，向您展示如何创建CAM特征。
The figure below shows all the types of CAM Features in ZW3D. This section will take Profile as an example to show the general steps on how to create a CAM Feature.
中望3D中的CAM特征
CAM Features in ZW3D
步骤 01 点击Robbin栏轮廓按钮打开轮廓选择窗口。
STEP 01 Click on the Ribbon Profile to call out the select window.
步骤 02 选择边或曲线来创建轮廓特征。
STEP 02 Select the edges or curves to make up a Profile.
步骤 03 设置属性然后点击确定，之后特征会显示在管理器中。
STEP 03 Set the attributes and press OK, then the feature will show in the Manager.
创建一个轮廓特征
Create a Profile Feature
还有两种方法可以打开特征选择窗口。一种是在CAM管理器中右键单击零件，然后选择添加特征。另一种是右键单击或者双击CAM管理器中特征。
There are another 2 ways to call out feature select window. One is to right-click on the part in CAM Manager; the other is to right-click or double-click on the text Feature.
另外两种方法打开特征选择窗口 (1)
Another 2 Ways to Call Out Feature Select Window (1)
另外两种方法打开特征选择窗口 (2)
Another 2 Ways to Call Out Feature Select Window (2)

用户可以在刀具管理器中定义刀具或者刀具库。您可以单击Robbin栏刀具或者在CAM管理树中右键单击刀具打开刀具管理器，如下图所示。用户可以输入参数创建一把刀具或者直接在刀具库中加载一把刀具。

Users can customize Tools or Tool Library with Tool Manager. You can click the Ribbon Tool or right-click on the text Tool in CAM Manager Tree to get access to Tool Library as the below figure shows. Users can either input the parameters to create a tool or direct load one from Library.
打开刀具管理器
Access to Tool Manager
刀具管理器
Tool Manager

下面是一个示例，演示了创建新刀具库的步骤。我们将在第4章中使用它。
Here is an example showing the steps to create a new Tool Library. We’ll use this in Chapter 4.
步骤 01 创建一个新的加工计划，命名为刀具库或者其他您想要的名字。
STEP 01 Create a new CAM Plan file named Tool Library or any other one you prefer.
创建一个新的加工计划
Create a New CAM Plan File
步骤 02 保存这个文件。
STEP 02 Save the file.
步骤 03 打开刀具管理器，然后如下图所示定义刀具中心钻5mm。
STEP 03 Open Tool Manager and define tool CenterDrill 5mm as below.
刀具“中心钻5mm”设置 (1)
Tool “CenterDrill 5mm” Settings (1)
刀具“中心钻5mm”设置 (2)
Tool “CenterDrill 5mm” Settings (2)
刀具“中心钻5mm”设置 (3)
Tool “CenterDrill 5mm” Settings (3)
刀具“中心钻5mm”设置 (4)
Tool “CenterDrill 5mm” Settings (4)
步骤 04 定义好刀具中心钻5mm的所有参数之后，点击刀具管理器下方的保存全部按钮。然后正确的路径把所有刀具数据保存到刀具库文件中。
STEP 04 Click Save All button on the Tool Manager after all the parameters of CenterDrill 5mm are defined. Then select the correct path to save all tool data in the Tool Library file.
保存刀具“中心钻5mm”
Save the Tool “CenterDrill 5mm”
步骤 05 如下图所示定义刀具普通钻8mm，然后点击保存全部。
STEP 05 Define the tool Drill 8mm as below, and then click Save All as previous.
刀具“普通钻8mm”设置 (1)
Tool “Drill 8mm” Settings (1)
刀具“普通钻8mm”设置 (2)
Tool “Drill 8mm” Settings (2)
步骤 06 如下图所示定义刀具普通钻10mm，然后点击保存全部。
STEP 06 Define the tool Drill 10mm as below, and then click Save All as previous.
刀具“普通钻  10mm”设置 (1)
Tool “Drill 10mm” Settings (1)
刀具“普通钻10mm”设置 (2)
Tool “Drill 10mm” Settings (2)
步骤 07 如下图所示定义刀具M10X1.25，然后点击保存全部。
STEP 07 Define the tool M10X1.25 as below, and then click Save All as previous.
Tool “M10X1.25” Settings (1)
Tool “M10X1.25” Settings (2)
步骤 08 再次保存文件后，使用指令~PmToolZ3ToXlsx输出刀具库文件。当您下次再想使用我们刚才创建的刀具的时候，您可以打开刀具管理器窗口然后点击加载刀具外形或者加载全部按钮。

STEP 08 Save the file again and exit and use the command ~PmToolZ3ToXlsx to output tool library file. The next time you want to use a cutter from the Tool Library we have just created, you can open the Tool Manager window and click Load from Lib or Load All button.
加载刀具库
Load Tool Library

如果刀轨可以接受，下一步该做的就是定义机器和控制器参数。用户可以在Ribbon栏上点击设备管理器或者在管理器树中点击设备来打开设备管理器窗口。

If toolpaths are acceptable, the next step should be done is to define machine and controller parameters. Users can click on Machine Manager in Ribbon or Machine in CAM Manager Tree to go to the setting window.
设备管理器
Machine Manager
设备名称：定义设备的名称。
Machine Name: Define the name of your machine.
类别：定义设备的类别。
Class: Define the classification of your machine.
类型：定义刀具或者工作台移动的类型。
Type: Define the tool/table movement type of your machine.
子类：根据上面“类型”定义子类。
Subtype: Define subtype according to Type above.
后置处理器：定义后置处理器。
Post-Processor: Define the post-processor to be used.
后置处理器配置：定义后置处理器配置。
Post Configuration: Define the post configuration.
XY，YZ，ZX平面弧线运动：定义是否支持在XY，YZ，ZX平面中圆弧插值。
XY Arcs, YZ Arcs, ZX Arcs: Define whether to support circular interpolation in the XY, YZ, or ZX planes.
检查多轴联动：控制是否做“多轴联动”的检测。
Check MULTAX: Define the name of your machine.
多轴联动：当为激活设备的加工方案创建NC程序时，确定是否输出刀具轴矢量。
MULTAX: Define whether to output tool axis vectors when creating NC codes.
精准RAPIDs：定义设备是否能够在快速横向移动过程中准确地从CL输出文件中定义的点移动到点。
Accurate RAPIDs: Define whether the machine is capable of accurately moving from point to point as defined in the CL Output file during RAPID Traversal moves.
缩放：定义一个比例因子，该因子应用于激活设备的加工方案的NC程序中的运动。
Scale: Define the scaling factor to apply to motion in NC codes.
#.xxxx：定义NC代码中的小数位。
#.xxxx: Define the number of decimal digits in NC codes.
重绕：定义在NC程序末尾重绕的说明是否输出。
Rewind: Define whether to rewind the tape at the end of the NC code.
增量：定义一个编号为“增量”的数控块。
Increment: Define the tape block numbering increment.
刀具补偿：在生成激活设备的NC程序时，确定是否输出刀具补偿声明。
CUTCOM: Define whether to output cutter compensation statements in NC codes.
偏移寄存器：定义偏移寄存器的范围和格式。
Offset Registers: Define Specify the range and format for Work Offset Registers.
NC后缀名：定义NC文件的后缀名。
NC Extension: Define the extension of NC file.
设备定义文件：定义设备的定义文件。
Definition File: Define machine definition file.

关键点：
Key Points:

Click Hole in Ribbon or right-click on the part in CAM Manager to create hole features.
如何创建孔特征
How to Create Hole Features
输入类型：选择拾取过滤器的实体类型。
Input type: Select the geometry type used as the pick filter.
孔：选中孔的数量。
Holes: The number of holes.
孔轴：如果指定了一条轴，只有此轴上的孔才能被选择。
Hole Axis: If an axis is specified, only those holes with the same axis will be selected.
孔列表：定义所选孔的分组方式。
Hole List: Define how the selected holes will be grouped.
最小/最大直径，最小/最大深度：定义直径和深度的范围，只有在范围内的孔才能被选择。
Min/Max Diameter, Min/Max Depth: Define the range of diameter and depth, only holes within the range will be selected.
公差：定义孔直径公差。如果刀具直径与孔的直径相差超过此公差，ZW3D将给出警告信息。
Tolerance: Define hole diameter tolerance. If the tool’s diameter differs from the hole’s by an amount greater than this tolerance, ZW3D will give a warning message.
表面光洁度：定义孔表面光洁度。仅供参考，在计算工具路径时不使用。
Finish: Define hole surface finish thickness. For reference only and is not used when calculating toolpaths.
用户可以选择孔，然后自定义孔特征属性。
Users can customize the attributes of hole features after picking.
孔特征属性
Hole Feature Attibutes
类型，尺寸：定义孔的尺寸和螺纹类型。
Type, Size: Define the thread type and size of the holes.
直径，深度：定义孔的直径和深度。
Diameter, Depth: Show the values of diameter and depth.
沉孔直径/角度：定义沉孔直径和角度。
Csink Diameter/Angle: Define the countersink diameter/Angle.
台阶孔直径/深度：定义台阶孔的直径和深度。
Cbore Diameter/Depth: Define the counterbore diameter/depth.
螺纹深度/螺距：定义螺纹深度和螺距。
Thrd Depth/Pitch: Define thread depth/pitch.
孔轴：指定替代的孔轴。否则中望3D CAM将会自动计算孔轴。
Hole Axis: Define an alternate hole axis. Otherwise, ZW3D will calculate it for you.
起始点：指定孔特征的起始点/起始深度，用于由点，圆和柱面定义的孔。
Start Point: Define the start point of holes defined by Point, Circle and Cylinder.

车削轮廓的关键点
Key Points for Turning Profile
车削工序
Turning Operations
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
下面是初学者在创建车削刀轨之前必须牢记的两个关键点。
There are 2 key points beginners should keep in mind before creating a Turning toolpath.
全局坐标系的X轴应与转向轴重合，原点应位于零件的右侧。
The X-axis of the global coordinate system should coincide with turning axis, and the origin should be located on the right side of the part.
在车削工序中最常用的特征是轮廓，它由一个闭合的逆时针的线框环组成。线框环是零件的截面轮廓，轮廓的类型必须是零件。

The most common feature used in Turning operations is Profile, which is made up of a closed anti-clockwise loop of Wireframes. The Wireframe loop is the section outline of the part, and Type of the Profile must be Part.

参数设置（1）
Parameter Settings (1)
备注：
Notes:
在公差和步距页面，保持刀轨公差为默认值，设置轴向余量和径向余量为0，切削步距为0.1，切削数为1。这意味着刀具仅切削坯料一次，且加工完成后，没有多余的材料剩余。

For options in Tolerance and Steps tab, keep Speeds, Feeds, Path Tolerance as default, and set Step Value to 0.1 and Number of Cuts to 1. This means that the material is cut by tool once and no extra material will be left after the operation is done.
参数设置（2）
Parameter Settings (2)
备注：
Notes:
这一页面中的所有设置与粗车工序相同。
All the settings in this tab are same as those in Rough operation.
参数设置（3）
Parameter Settings (3)
刀轨设置-反转刀路：反转加工的方向，但不改变刀路的形状。
Path Setting -Cut Reverse: Define whether to reverse cutting and don’t change the toolpaths shape.
-补偿：定义刀具补偿类型。
- Tool Compensation: Define the compensation type.
如果选择电脑，输出按照刀尖半径偏移后的刀路，即刀具参考点沿刀路走即可加工出需要的轮廓。
If set this to Computer, the toolpaths will get compensation when calculating.
如果选择控制器，输出无偏移的刀路，并输出G42。（刀补指令在刀轨起始点打开，结束点关闭）
If set this to Control, the toolpaths won’t get compensation when calculating, but will output G42 command.
如果选择磨损，输出按照刀尖半径偏移后的刀路，并输出G42。
If set this to Wear, the toolpaths will get compensation when calculating and output G42 command also.
如果选择反向磨损，输出按照刀尖半径偏移后的刀路，并输出G41。
If set this to Reverse Wear, the toolpaths will get compensation when calculating and output G41 command instead of G42.
如果选择关，输出无偏移的刀路。
If set this to Off, the toolpaths won’t get compensation at all.
备注：
Notes:
在刀轨设置页面中，把反转刀路设置为否，把刀具补偿这是为电脑，其他参数和粗车工序一样。这样设置意味着刀具将会从右到左加工零件的外表面，并带有刀具补偿，刀具不会加工凹形区域。

For options in Path Setting tab, set Cut Reverse to NO and Tool Compensation to Computer, the others are same as Rough. This means that the tool will cut outside surface of the part from right to left with compensation and will not cut into concaves.

Notes:
这个页面中的所有设置和粗车工序一样。

参数设置（3）
Parameter Settings (3)
刀轨设置-切削策略：选择单向、Z字形或者交替切削策略，它们的不同点详见图151。
Path Setting -Cut Strategy: Select the cut strategy from One Way, Zigzag and Alternate. The difference between is shown in Figure 153.
-退刀距离：定义粗车切槽退刀后刀具离开槽壁的距离。
-Relief Amount: Define the distance from the tool to groove side when retracting.
-坯料高度：定义槽加工前，剩余坯料的厚度。
-Stock Height: Define the amount of stock above the top of the groove before the rough turning begins.
-停歇时间：定义粗车切槽时刀具停留在槽底的时间。默认时间单位是秒。
-Dwell Time: Define the dwell time the tool stays at the bottom of the groove in the rough grooving.
-粗加工径向延伸：定义粗车切槽的开始点与槽右顶点间的距离。
-Rough Clearance: Define the clearance above the top of grooves.
-安全距离：主要用于加工多个槽时，避免刀具在刀轨之间移动时发生碰撞。刀具会先提刀到安全距离然后再平移到下一个槽进行加工。
-Safe Distance: Define the distance above the part when the tool is moving from a groove region to another.
-输出类型：定义车削刀轨的输出方式。
-Output Type: Define whether to output circle command in NC files.
-启用深度切削：设置是否使用分层车槽功能，从下拉列表中选择是或否。
-Enable Level Control: Define whether to enable level control from Yes or No.
-精加工槽：在粗车切槽后是否使用精车切槽，从下拉列表中选择是、否或仅。
-Finish Groove: Define whether to enable finish cut after rough grooving.
-精加工余量：定义精车切槽结束后，坯料在车床X轴和Z轴方向的剩余量。
-Finish Thick: Define the thickness of material after finish grooving is done.
-精加工次数：控制精车切槽的刀轨层数。
-Finish Number: Define the level numbers of finish grooving.
-精加工距离：控制精车切槽每层刀轨的间距。
-Finish Distance: Define the distance between each toolpath of finish grooving.
-退刀位置：定义第一刀精车切槽的退刀点位置与槽右顶点的轴向距离。
-Retract Position: Define the distance from the tool to groove side when retracting.
-重叠距离：指定第一刀和第二刀（如果存在）精车切槽间的重复切削距离。
-Overlap: Define the overlap distance between two cuts.
-离壁距离：设置精车切槽的退刀宽度，即退刀开始点与结束点间的轴向距离。注意，必须存在第二刀精车切槽时，该参数才有效。
-Back Off Distance: Define retract distance of finish grooving, only take effect when the second pass of finish grooving exists.
备注：
Notes:
在刀轨设置页面中，设置切削策略为Z字形， 把精加工槽设为是。此设置意味着刀具将会以Z字形刀轨加工槽，粗加工之后将会进行精加工。

For options in Path Setting tab, set Cut Strategy to Zigzag and Finish Groove to Yes. This means that the tool will cut the grooves in a Zigzag shape of toolpath and enables a finish cut after roughing.

通常，当你开始新的3X快速铣削编程时，第一步是评估制造模型，以便你对如何简化复杂模型有一个大致的了解，然后定义合适的粗加工、残料粗加工、半精加工、精加工工序生成合适的刀具路径。应验证刀轨以避免工件损坏并确保高质量加工。最后，指定合适的后处理器将刀轨转换为用于制造的GM代码。ZW3D 3轴铣削的工作流程如下所示：

Generally, when you start a new 3X milling programming, the first step is to evaluate the manufacturing model so that you will have a general idea on how to simplify a complicated model, and then define suitable roughing, rest roughing, semi-finishing, finishing operations to generate toolpaths. The toolpaths should be verified to avoid workpiece damage and to ensure high-quality machining. Finally, specify a suitable post processor to translate the toolpaths to GM code for manufacturing.  The workflow in ZW3D 3X milling is shown below.

粗加工用于将材料从坯料快速去除到零件，这里设置一个较大的刀具去提高加工效率。当然，我们需要为下一道工序留下均匀余料。ZW3D提供四种粗加工操作，以满足不同的加工情况。

Roughing is used to quickly remove the material from stock to part, which sets a large stepdown with a large cutter to improve manufacturing efficiency. Of course, we need to leave a uniform rest material for the next process. ZW3D provides 4 types of roughing operations to satisfy different machining situations.

边界
Boundaries
这是一个设置水平（XY）和垂直（Z）加工区域限制的页面。
It is a page to set the limitation of the horizontal(XY) and vertical(Z) machining region.
边界页面
Boundaries page
限制类型 : 这里列出了三种限制类型，包括轮廓 和 立方体 。
Containment Type: There are three containment types list here including Silhouettes, and Simple Box.
轮廓 : 创建零件的最大投影轮廓作为限制边界。
Silhouettes: Create the maximum projection contour of the part as the limiting boundary.
立方体 : 围绕零件创建一个最小的立方体，使用零件的投影轮廓作为限制边界。
Simple Box: Create a smallest cube surround the part, use its projection contour of the part as the limiting boundary.
在ZW3D，用户无需定义坯料即可计算粗加工刀轨。因此，在讨论边界时我们需要从两个方面去说明：带有坯料的特征和没有坯料的特征。

In ZW3D, users can calculate the roughing toolpaths without defining a stock. Hence, when discussing the boundaries, we need to illustrate it in two aspects: feature with stock and feature without stock.
带有坯料的特征：当在加工特征中添加毛坯时，轮廓 和立方体 选项将无效。刀轨在坯料中生成。并且如果添加了轮廓，刀轨将在坯料和轮廓之间的相交区域内生成。

Feature with stock: When a stock is added in the machining feature, the Silhouettes and Simple Box options will be invalid. The toolpaths are generated within the stock. And if a profile is added, the toolpaths will be generated within the intersection region between stock and profile.
坯料特征
Feature with stock
无坯料特征：当加工特征中未添加坯料时，ZW3D将轮廓  和立方体  的限制边界设置为虚拟的坯料，生成没有轮廓的刀轨。添加轮廓后，轮廓  和立方体  选项将失效，刀轨将在零件的最小立方体与轮廓的相交区域内生成。

Feature without stock: When the stock is not added in the machining feature, ZW3D will set the limiting boundary of Silhouettes or Simple Box as the virtual stock to generate the toolpaths without a profile. After adding the profile, the Silhouettes and Simple Box options will be invalid, the toolpaths will be generated within the intersection region between the smallest cube of the part and profile.
特征中没有坯料
Feature without stock
限制刀具在坯料边界内 :  定义所有生成的切削刀轨是否在坯料中。
Limit Tool by Stock:  To define whether all the generated toolpaths are within the stock or not.
限制刀具在坯料边界内
Limit tool by stock
铸件偏移 : 定义一个值，ZW3D会使用定义的值创建一个具有一致的余量的自定义坯料，然后生成清理刀轨，从坯料加工成零件的过程中移除材料。保持空白或者设置为0，该选项将失效。

Cast Offset: Define a value, ZW3D will create a customed stock that has united allowance using the defined value, then generate the clearance toolpaths to remove the material from the stock to part. Keep it blank or set it 0, this option is invalid.
铸件偏移
Cast offset
顶部/底部 : 顶部和底部选项用于定义Z轴方向的加工区域，这意味着 在垂直方向上，刀轨将从顶部点到底部点受到限制。它们可以通过零件上拾取点或者指定值来定义。它们中的任何一个都可以是空白的，它将受到坯料边界的限制。

Top/Bottom: Top and bottom options are used to define the manufacturing region in the Z-Axis direction, which means the toolpaths will be limited from the top point to the bottom point in the vertical direction. And they could be defined via picking points on the part or specifying a value. Either of them could be blank, it will be limited by the boundary of stock.
从顶部到底部受到限制
Top and bottom limit
参考刀具
Reference tool
这个页面的参数用于优化残余粗加工。在ZW3D中有三种方法。
The parameters on this page are used to optimize the rest roughing. There are 3 ways for it in ZW3D.
设置参考工序
Set reference operation
指定残余材料作为坯料
Specify rest material as stock
指定参考刀具
Specify reference tool
建议优先使用参考工序。
And reference operation is recommended to be used in priority.
参考刀具
Reference Tool
参考刀具 : 指定较大的刀具。假设是预先用于粗加工，同时残料将被留下，然后使用当前刀具生成刀轨移除残料。

Reference Tool: Specify a larger tool. Hypothetically, it was used for roughing in advance and the rest material will be left. Then, use the current tool to generate toolpaths to remove the rest material.
最小残料厚度 :  输入阈值（0.5mm）。计算会忽略比它更薄（0.5mm）的残料。它避免了可忽略区域的剩余切削。此选项在定义参考工序时也可使用。

Min Rest Height: Enter a threshold value(0.5 mm).The calculation ignores rest material thinner than it(0.5 mm). It avoids a rest-cut of the negligible regions. This option is also available when defining a reference operation.
扩展区域 : 输入距离（1mm）去扩展残余区域（红色轮廓），将沿轮廓表面扩展输入的数值（1mm）。这通常与 最小残料厚度 一起使用，通过偏移残余区域来移除未检测到的区域（粉红色轮廓）。此选项在定义参考工序时也可使用。

Expand Area: Enter a distance(1 mm) to expand the rest region(outlined in red), which will be extended along the surface according to it(1 mm). This is usually used with Min Rest Height to remove the undetected area(outlined in pink) by offsetting the rest region. This option is also available when defining a reference operation.
参考刀具参数
Reference tool parameters
检查
Check
检测刀轨和辅助设备（如工作台，夹具，刀架等）之前的碰撞，确保加工安全。
Detect the collision between the toolpaths and assistant equipment(such as the table, clamp, tool holder, etc), which ensures machining safely.
检查页面
Check page
检查所有零件 : 当将零件某些曲面定义为加工特征时，启用此选项（是）以避免刀具撞到零件中。
Check all of Part: When defining some surfaces of the part as the machining feature. Turn on this option(Yes) to avoid the tool crash into the part.
检查所有零件
Check all of part
检查最小刀长 : 如果在刀具管理器中定义了夹持，将其打开（是），ZW3D将计算最小刀具长度以避免夹持碰撞。最小长度将显示在CAM管理器的刀具页面上。

Check Shortest Tool: If a tool holder is defined in the tool manager, turn it on(Yes), ZW3D will calculate the minimum tool length to avoid the holder collision. The minimum length will be displayed on the Tool page in the CAM manager.
提示 :
Tips:
1. 刀具夹持的定义位于刀具管理器的第三个选项卡上。
1. The tool holder's definition is on the 3rd tab of the tool manager.
2. 你可以在CAM管理器中右键单击 加工设置，打开 设置 对话框。选中“最小值”以显示最小长度。
2. You can right-click the Setup in the CAM manager to open the Setting dialog box. Check on the Minimum to display the minimum length.
显示最小长度
Display the minimum length
考虑工作台 : 选择是. ZW3D 将会根据工作台的位置生成刀轨，避免工作台被刀具切割。
Consider Tables: Select Yes. ZW3D will generate the toolpaths according to the position of the table, which avoids the table to be cut by the tool.
工作台安全距离 : 设置一个安全距离，可以限制靠近工作台生成的刀轨。
Safe Distance Table: Set a safe distance, which limits the toolpaths to be generated close to the table.
考虑工作台和安全距离
Consider table and safe distance
考虑夹具 : 选择是。ZW3D将考虑已定义的夹具生成刀轨，且不会在安全区域内生成。
Consider Clamps: Select Yes. ZW3D will generate toolpaths considering the clamps which have been defined and will not be manufactured within a safety region.
铣削区域 : 更改生成刀轨的方向。
Mill Region: Change the direction of generating toolpaths.
夹具安全距离 : 输入一个安全距离（2mm），刀具将与夹具保持距离（2mm）。
Safe Distance Clamp: Enter a safe distance(2 mm), the cutter will maintain a distance(2 mm) from the clamps.
考虑夹具和安全距离
Consider clamp and safe distance
检查夹持 : 选择是。生成刀轨时将会考虑夹持，避免夹持撞到产品。因此，应提前先定义好夹持。
Check Holder: Select Yes. The tool holder will be considered when generating the toolpaths, which avoids the holder crash to the product. Hence, the tool holder should be defined in advance.
夹持安全距离 :  输入安全距离（例如：1mm），刀具将和夹持保持距离（1mm）。
Safe Distance Holder:  Enter a safe distance(1 mm), the cutter will maintain a distance(1 mm) from the holder.
考虑夹持和安全距离
Consider holder and safe distance
过滤器
Filter
%最小长度/范围 : 输入一个值（例如：10），该值将用于计算阈值（10%*刀具直径）。ZW3D 将移除 跨距与面积比小于阈值的刀具路径，以避免可忽略的切削，避免了可以忽略的切削。

% Small Length/Area:  Enter a value(10), which will be used to calculate the threshold value(10% *tool diameter). ZW3D will eliminate the toolpaths’ level whose ratio between span and area is less than the threshold value to avoid the negligible cut.

可以在此页面上对切削刀轨进行控制或优化。
The cutting toolpaths can be controlled or optimized on this page.
刀轨设置
Path Setting
切削控制
Cutting Control
填充刀轨方向/清边刀轨方向 : 定义填充切削刀轨和清边切削刀轨的方向，清边切削刀轨是接近每层特征边界的最后的刀轨，填充切削刀轨（在下面的假想线内）在清边切削刀轨内。

Filling Cut Direction/Clean Cut Direction: Define the filling cut and clean-cut toolpaths’ direction. Clean cut toolpaths are the last toolpaths close to the feature boundary of each level. Filling cut toolpaths(within the imaginary lines below) are inside the clean cut toolpaths.
Filling clean cut toolpaths
填充和清边切削刀轨
Climb: Only use climb milling to generate the toolpaths. The tool is on the left of the machined edge when viewing in the tool movement direction.
顺铣 : 只使用顺铣生成刀轨。从刀具运动方向观察，刀具位于加工边缘的左侧。
Conventional:  Only use conventional milling to generate toolpaths. The tool is on the right of the machined edge when viewing in the tool movement direction.
逆铣 : 只使用逆铣生成刀轨。从刀具运动方向观察，刀具位于加工边缘的右侧。
Climb and conventional
顺铣和逆铣
Any: ZW3D will assign the toolpaths to climb or conventional to get Zigzag pattern toolpaths.
任何 : ZW3D将把刀轨分配为顺铣或逆铣，以得到Z字形的刀轨。
Automatic: It will follow the filling cut toolpaths.
自动 : 将跟随填充切削刀轨的方向生成刀轨。
Cut Order: Specify the cutting priority between cutting region and level.
切削顺序 : 指定切削顺序为区域优先或逐层优先。
Region First: It will completely process one region before going on to another one.
区域优先 : 它会先完全加工完这个区域后，才进入另一个区域进行加工。
Level First: It will completely process one level of each region before going down to the next level.
逐层优先 : 它会先完全加工完每个区域的这一高度层，才进入下一层高度进行加工。
Cut order
切削顺序
Path Pattern Guide: The toolpaths will be generated according to part silhouette, stock silhouette, or both.
刀轨样式向导 : 刀轨将会根据零件轮廓，坯料轮廓，或者同时根据两者轮廓生成相同方向的刀轨。
Path pattern guide
刀轨样式向导
Region Order: Specify the cutting sequence of each region.
区域顺序 : 指定每个区域的切削顺序。
Near: It will go on to the nearest region after finishing processing one region.
最近距离 : 加工完一个区域后会继续到最近的区域进行加工。
Region order by near
X/Y Along: Process the region along the X/Y direction, then go to the beginning of the next row/column to continue the process.
最近距离的区域顺序
X/Y ZigZag: Process the region along the X/Y direction, then go to the nearest region of the next row/column to continue the process.
沿X/Y方向 : 沿X/Y方向加工所有区域后，再移动至下一行或列的开头继续沿X/Y方向完成该方向区域的加工。
X/Y along and zigzag
沿X/Y方向的Z字型 : 沿X/Y方向加工所有区域后，再移动至下一行或列的最近区域继续沿X/Y方向区域加工。

Synchro ZLevel: Click this option and pick the point(s) in the graphic area. The toolpaths must be generated to pass the point(s). This option is used to maintain uniform allowance on the planner surfaces which selected from the part manually.
沿X/Y方向和Z字型
Finish Pass
同步加工层: 单击此选项并选择图形区域中的点，必须生成通过该点的刀轨（当存在余量时（例如Z向曲面余量=1），会在此点平面上的1mm高度处的层上生成刀轨。此选项用于在从零件手动选择的平面上保持均匀的余量。

Island Topping: There three options in this function, including No, Whole Flat Level, and Flat Regions. This operation will automatically detect the flat based on the selected option. Check on this option(Yes), another option(%Island Area) will be displayed The operation will automatically detect the planar face on the part. The toolpaths will be generated to machine the planar face to get a uniform rest material. It is a way to generate the Synchro ZLevel toolpaths without picking the sync point(s) manually.
清刀刀轨
Finish Pass
平面检查 : 该功能有三个选项，分别为 否 、整个平坦层 及 平面区域 ，该操作将根据各个选项自动检测零件上的平面，在检测到的平面上生成刀轨以获得均匀的残余坯料。这是一种无需手动选取同步点 即可生成同步加工层  的刀轨的方法。
Whole Flat Level: Detect the flat regions and create toolpath for the whole level. It should be used with % Island Area parameters.
清刀刀轨

% Island Area: Specify a value. It will calculate a threshold area according to the percentage of the value (Threshold area= Silhouettes area of the part * Value%). Only if the area of the planar face is equal to or greater than the threshold area, the planar will be considered for generating toolpaths.
整个平坦层 : 检测平面区域并生成整层的刀轨，需要与 %区域 参数配合使用。
Flat Regions: Detect the flat regions but only create toolpath for the current type level, which include two options
%区域 : 指定一个值，它将根据该值的百分比计算出一个阈值区域（阈值区域=零件的轮廓区域*该值%）。只有当平面面积等于或大于阈值区域面积时，才会考虑在该平面上生成刀轨。
Synchro ZLevel and Flat Detection
平面区域 : 检测平面区域并仅在当前类型的平面上生成刀轨，共有两种选项，分别为 平坦区域 和 浅谈区域 。
Corner Control
同步加工层和平面检查
To adjust the pattern of the toolpaths at the corner, setting the parameters here could get an expected result to satisfy different machining requirements.
转角控制
Corner Control
要调整转角处的刀轨样式，在此处设置参数可以得到预期的结果，可以满足不同的加工要求。
Corner Control: Specify a method to generate the toolpaths at the corner.
转角控制
Corner control pattern
转角控制 : 指定在转角处生成刀具路径的方法。

Sharp Angle: This option is valid only if D Loop was selected in Corner Control. Specify a threshold value. If the corner angle of the toolpaths is equal to or less than it. A D Loop pattern will be generated.
转角控制样式
Sharp angle
周边转角 : 指定清边切削刀具路径的圆角值。
XY Corner Radius: Specify the fillet value for clean cut toolpaths.
%XY光滑度 : 指定一个值。它将根据步进 值（圆角值=步进值* %XY光滑度）计算得到一个圆角值。此圆角值将用于生成填充切削刀轨的转角。

% XY Smoothing: Specify a value. It will calculate a fillet value according to it with the Stepover value(Fillet value=Stepover value * value%). This fillet value will be used to generate the Filling cut toolpaths.

通常，ZW3D的刀具路径的构成有进刀（慢进刀），退刀（远离），切削，插削，快速移动 和连接 段刀轨。在一些案例中，为了优化刀具路径，一些短连接刀轨将被看作为切削刀轨。并且每个段都将以不同的颜色显示。

In general, the toolpaths structure of ZW3D has lead in(engage), lead out(retract), cut, plunge, rapid and link segments. In some cases, to optimize the toolpaths, some short links will be treated as a cut movement. And each segment will be displayed with different colors.
过切检查 : 默认情况下选中此选项。它用于检查关于引导（进退刀）和连接的刀具路径的过切。在大多情况下，它应该被选中，只有在极少数特殊情况下，它可以不被选中，以实现奇怪的刀具路径，如刀轨编辑器 的延伸。

Gouge Check:  This option is checked by default. It is used to check the gouge of toolpaths about lead and link. In most of the cases, it should be checked on, only very few special scenarios it could be checked off for achieving the wondering toolpaths, such as the extension in Tool Path Editor.
连接
Link
连接选项用于定义如何连接相邻的切削运动。有两种连接类型：短连接和长连接。用户可以根据不同的加工场景设置适当的连接类型。

The link options are used to define how to connect the adjacent cutting movements. There are two types of links: short link, and long link. Users enable to set proper link types on them in terms of different machining scenarios.
短连接界限 : 短连接界限是指相邻切削运动的尾部和头部之间的距离。在此选项上指定阈值以将连接分为两种类型。大于阈值的连接将被分配为长连接，反之为短连接。

Short Link Limit: The short link limit means the distance between the tail and the head of adjacent cutting movements. Specify a threshold value on this option to separate the links into two types. Links are greater than the threshold will be assigned as long links, otherwise, they will be short links.
短连接方式 : ZW3D提供5种短连接方式以满足不同的加工需求。它们是在曲面上、下切步距、样条曲线、相对高度、安全高度。
Short Link Type: ZW3D provides 5 kinds of short links to fulfill different machining requirements. They are On surface, Step, Spline, Optimized, Clearance.
长连接方式 : ZW3D提供2种长连接方式以满足不同的加工需求。它们是相对高度、安全高度。
Long Link Type: ZW3D provides 2 kinds of long link to satisfy different machining requirements. They are Optimized, Clearance.
默认连接类型 : 从列表中选择连接移动的类型，有相对高度、安全高度，如果不满足短连接的约束条件，或者如果它们过切，则使用该类型的连接方式。
Default Link Type: Select the type of link moves from the list, which provides optimized and clearance, to be used if the constraint criteria for short links are not met, or if they gouge.
连接类型
Link type
安全距离 : 该值用于设置刀轨在区域间移动时刀具距离零件表面的高度值，以避免与毛坯和加工零件发生碰撞。
Safe Distance: This value is added to the clearance that is automatically detected to avoid hitting the stock and machining part.
安全平面 : 该值定义为从该工序所用的坐标系Z轴原点开始沿+Z向测量的刀具安全高度。
Clearance Z: This value is defined as the tool clearance distance measured from the origin of the Z-axis of the alternate frame.
提示 : 安全平面 的默认值将继承 CAM 管理器中设置的全局 安全高度 值。
Tips: The default value of Clearance Z will inherit the global Clearances set in the CAM manager.
插削高度 : 这是在实际切削开始之前切入的距离，是在每次进刀之前添加的插削式移动，以实现更安全的刀具接合。
Plunge Length: This is a distance for a plunge before the start of the actual cut. It is a plunge move added before each lead in for safer tool engagement.
添加进退刀到短连接 : 该选项用于控制是否在短连接之前添加退刀或在短连接之后添加进刀刀轨。
Add Lead to Short Link: It is an option that controls whether to add leads (lead in and lead out) before short link.
添加进退刀到短连接
Add Lead to Short Link
%样条曲线的曲率 : 指定一个值来控制样条线的形状，该值仅适用于样条曲线连接移动。设置的值越大，生成的凸样条曲线越多。
%Spline Elasticity: Specify a value to control the shape of the spline, which is only available for spline link moves. The larger value is set, the more convex spline will be generated.
短连接类型和%样条曲线的曲率
Sort Link Type and %Spline Elasticity
%样条曲线的曲率
%Spline Elasticity
进刀
Lead In
用于定义刀具接近毛坯时的运动。
It is used to define the movement of the tool approaching the stock.
进刀方式 : ZW3D提供3种刀具进刀方式，包括 圆弧直线，螺线，沿刀轨斜向。
Engage Type: ZW3D provides 3 types of lead in toolpaths including Arc_Line, Helical, Along_Toolpath.
进刀方式
Lead type
注意 : 当在粗加工操作中应用 螺线 进刀，并且请求的螺线圆弧进刀不适用于加工区域时，将自动使用 沿刀具斜向 的方法。 如果 沿刀具斜向 也不适用，无 将被自动使用。因此，它们的优先级是：螺线 >> 沿刀具斜向 >> 无。

Note: When applying the Helical lead-in in roughing operations, and the requested circle cannot be fitted into the machining area, then the Along_Toolpath method is used automatically. If Along_Toolpath doesn’t fit either, None will be used automatically. Hence, the priority of them is: Helical >> Along_Toolpath >>None.
进刀圆弧类型 : 定义圆弧进刀刀轨的方向。
Engage Arc Type: Define the direction of the arc.
进刀参数
Engage Parameters
水平 : 圆弧将在平行于XY平面的平面上生成。
Horizontal: The arc will be generated on the plane which is parallel to the XY plane.
垂直 : 圆弧将在垂直于XY平面的平面上生成。
Vertical: The arc will be generated on the plane which is perpendicular to the XY plane.
法向 : 圆弧将在垂直于加工曲面的平面上生成。
Normal: The arc will be generated on the plane which is perpendicular to the machining surface.
进刀圆弧类型
Engage Arc Type
进刀圆弧半径 : 指定圆弧的半径。
Engage Arc Radius: Specify the arc radius.
绝对值 : 指定一个值来定义圆弧半径。
Absolute: Specify a value to define the arc radius.
%刀具半径 : 指定刀具半径的百分比来定义圆弧半径。
%Tool Rad: Specify a percentage of the tool radius to define the arc radius.
进刀圆弧角度 : 制定一个值来定义圆弧的角度。
Engage Arc Angle: Specify a value to define the arc angle.
进刀长度 : 指定一个值来定义进刀长度。
Engage Length: Specify a value to define the length.
进刀斜坡角度 : 指定斜坡角度值。
Engage Ramp Angle: Specify the ramp angle value.
进刀斜坡高度 : 指定斜坡高度值。
Engage Ramp Height: Specify the ramp height value.
安全斜坡长度 : 使用安装刀片类旋转刀具进行粗加工时，如果切削刀具路径太小而无法在小区域内切削掉所有材料，则剩余材料可能会与刀具没有切削作用的部分（如盘铣刀的中心）发生碰撞并导致刀具损坏。因此，有一个选项可以帮助消除安全生成中的小区域中的刀轨。 通常，最小值为（刀具直径- 2* 刀片宽度）。例如，使用刀片宽度为 4mm 的 D40R2 刀具，最小值将为 (40-2*4)=32。

Safe Ramp Length: When using the non-center cutting tools for roughing. If cutting toolpaths are too small to cut all the material out in small regions, the rest material might have a collision with the cuter and cause the tool damage. So there is an option for helping to eliminate the small movements for safety manufacturing.  In general, the minimum value is (Tool diameter- 2* blade width). For example, using a D40R2 cutter with a 4mm width blade, the minimum value will be (40-2*4)=32.

如果用户不确定刀具寿命能否完成整个刀具路径的加工，尤其是复合刀具。这是刀具路径中断功能，使用户能够根据加工时间或铣削距离来中断刀具路径，以检查和刀具损坏或更换刀片。

If users are not sure the tool-life could finish the machining of the whole toolpaths, particularly for the composite cutter. Here are the toolpaths breaks function that enables users to break the toolpaths in terms of the machining time or milling distance, for checking and tool damage or change the inserts.
暂停/打断
Pause/Break
打断类型 : 根据加工时间或刀具路径的长度来定义刀具路径的断点。
Break Type: Define if the toolpaths breakpoint according to machining time or toolpaths’ length.
无 : 不会在当前刀具路径上生成断点。
None: It will not generate the breakpoints on current toolpaths.
时间 : 以切割时间为单位生成断点，单位为分钟。
Time: Generate the breakpoints in terms of the cutting time, its unit is minute.
长度 : 根据刀具路径的距离生成断点，单位为毫米。
Length: Generate the breakpoints in terms of the toolpaths’ distance, its unit is millimeter.
退刀类型: 选择 绝对 或 相对 作为退刀类型。
Retract Type: Select the Absolute or Relative as the retract type.
退刀距离（绝对）:在激活的坐标系中指定一个固定的 Z 值，这将是断点的退刀平面。
Retract Distance (Absolute): Specify a fixed Z value in the activated frame, which will be the retract plane of the breakpoints.
退刀距离（相对）: 指定与 Z 方向的断点的相对距离，这将是断点的退刀点。
Retract Distance (Relative): Specify the distance which is related to the breakpoints in the Z direction, which will be the retract points of the breakpoints.
运动类型 : 选择 进给运动 或 快速运动 为中断运动。
Motion Type: Select Feed Move or Rapid Move as the break motion.
进给运动 : 新增的中断刀具路径的速度和进给将与切削刀具路径相同。
Feed Move: The additional break toolpaths’ speed and feed rates will be the same as the cutting toolpaths’.
快速运动 : 新增的中断刀具路径的速度和进给将与快速刀具路径相同。
Rapid Move: The additional break toolpaths’ speed and feed rates will be the same as the rapid toolpaths’.
插削距离 : 指定中断刀具路径的插削距离。
Plunge Distance: Specify the plunge distance of the break toolpaths.
等待时间 : 定每个断点的等待时间（秒）。
Wait time: Specify the waiting time(second) for each breakpoint.
进给设置
Feed Control
AFC（高级进给控制）是计算 QM 进给的另一种方法。它将根据切削负载自动改变进给，从而使刀具路径平滑，延长刀具寿命。

AFC (Advanced Feed Control) is an alternative method of calculating QM feeds. It will automatically change the feed rates according to the chip-load, which smoothed the toolpaths to increase the tool life.
高级进给控制
Feed Control
启用高级进给控制 : 打开此选项（是），将显示更多的 AFC 参数。
Enable AFC: Turn this option on(Yes), more AFC parameters will be displayed.
短跨距长 : 用于去除长跨度之间进给较高的小跨度的值。值越大，铣削过程越平滑，速度越慢。
Short Span Distance: The value used to remove small spans with higher feed between long spans. A larger value will make the milling process smoother and slower.
正面因子 : 刚性越强、刃口越多的刀具，该系数就越高。对于正面因子，我们将进给（速率）除以该值。有效范围是 1 到 20。
Frontal Factor: A more rigid tool, with more flutes, has this coefficient higher. For the Frontal Factor, we divide the feed (rate) by this value. The valid range is from 1 to 20.
径向因子 : 刚性越强、刃口越多的刀具，该系数就越低。
Radial Factor: A more rigid tool, with more flutes, has this coefficient lower.
最小进给速度 : 指定最小进给速度。
Min Feed Rate: Specify the minimum feed rate.
%最大进给速度 : 根据最小进给速度的百分比指定最大进给速度。
%Max Feed Rate: Specify the maximum feed rate according to the percentage of the minimum feed rate.
%刀具吃刀量 : 刀具吃刀量占刀具高度的百分比。
%Tool Height Load: Tool loading as a % of tool height.
更多设置

Note: In general, the CNC machine has two types of rapid movements, which could be defined in the configuration of the CNC controller. 残料粗加工是使用较小的工具来消除大台阶和大型粗加工刀具无法到达的模型的粗糙区域，例如型腔和角落。ZW3D 提供了 3 种方式来实现残料粗加工模式，包括参考工序、参考刀具和残余毛坯。参考刀具功能已在第 2.2.2 章 参考刀具 页面介绍，下面将演示参考工序和残余毛坯方法。

Rest roughing is using a smaller tool to eliminate the large terraces and to rough areas of the model that the large roughing cutting tool could not reach, such as pockets and corners. ZW3D offers 3 ways to achieve the rest roughing pattern, including reference operation, reference tool, and rest stock. The reference tool function has been introduced on the Reference Tool page in chapter 2.2.2, and reference operation and rest stock methods will be demonstrated below.

精加工的目的不同于粗加工。粗加工侧重于快速去除多余的材料，因此它将使用大的步距和刀具。但精加工注重尺寸精度和表面质量，它将使用高速、小步距和合适的刀具来确保高质量的结果。

The purpose of finishing operation is different from roughing‘s. Roughing focuses on removing the excess material rapidly, so it will use a big step and tool. But finishing focuses on dimensional accuracy and surface quality, it will use a high speed, smaller step, and suitable tool to ensure a high-quality result.
精加工操作中的大部分参数与粗加工的参数相同，因此我们只介绍不同的或仅存在于其中的参数。此外，每种精加工操作都有自己的刀轨样式生成理论和适合的应用场景。 这些将一一介绍。

Most parameters in finishing operation are the same as roughing’s, so we will only introduce the different ones or the ones that only exist in it. In addition, each finishing operation has its own pattern generation theory and suitable application scenarios. Those will be introduced one by one.

角度限制工序是一个复合工序。它将根据用户设置的陡峭角度值来区分平坦区域和陡峭区域，然后为这些区域分配适当的刀具路径模式。平行铣削，三维偏移切削  或高速平行铣削 操作用于平坦区域，等高线切削 用于陡峭区域，以便通过一次操作在零件上获得均匀的表面光洁度。

Angle limiting operation is a composite program. It will distinguish where are the shallow and steep regions in terms of the steep angle value, which set by users, then assign proper toolpaths mode to those regions. Lace, Offset 3D, or HSM Lace operation is used for flat areas and Z Level is used for steep regions, for getting uniform surface finishing on the part with one operation.

平坦样式 : 为平坦区域指定刀具路径样式，建议使用 平行铣削 或 三维偏移切削。

Path Setting
角度限制工序—刀轨设置
Angle Limiting operation-—Path Setting
限制方式 : 指定检测陡峭区域的方式。
Limiting Method: Specify a method to detect the steep regions.
a) 几何体 : 根据几何体表面法线与 XY 平面法线之间的夹角来检测陡峭区域。
a) Geometry: Detect the steep regions based on the angle between the normal of the geometric surface and the normal of the XY plane.
b) 刀轨 : 根据刀具路径外轮廓法线与XY平面法线之间的角度来检测陡峭区域。
b) ToolPath: Detect the steep regions according to the angle between the normal of the outer contour of the toolpaths and the normal of the XY plane.
陡峭角度 : 指定角度值以区分陡峭区域和平坦区域。法线与 XY 平面法线之间的角度大于该值的特征将被定义为陡峭区域。例如，将“陡峭角度”设置为 60，则平面法线与 XY 平面法线之间的夹角为 0-60 度的特征将是平坦区域。否则，它们将是陡峭区域。

Steep Angle: Specify an angle value to distinguish the steep regions and flat regions. Features where the angle between the normal and the XY plane normal greater than this value will be defined as the steep regions. For example, set Steep Angle as 60, then the features where the angle between the plane normal and the XY plane normal is 0-60 degrees will be the flat regions. Otherwise, they will be the steep regions.

Cut Regions: Specify regions to generate toolpaths, all regions, flat regions, or steep regions.

切削顺序 :指定切削顺序，有平坦区域优先，或 陡峭区域优 先 两种选择。
Cut Order: Specify cut order, flat first, or steep first.
重叠距离: 指定 平坦区域 和 陡峭区域 之间的刀轨的重叠距离大小。
Overlap: Specify the overlap size of toolpaths between flat area and steep area.

QM Server Configure refers to 3x operations that are completed editing on user’s local machine through the network to other’s personal computers or high-performance servers for computing. 为保证计算效率，ZW3D 快速铣削采用先进的缓存控制，包括缓存文件和STL数据。增量计算使用缓存文件，STL数据是快速铣削计算的基础。但是长期使用，ZW3D会产生大量的缓存文件。用户可以使用 清理快速铣削缓存区&清理快速铣削目录 来清理这些文件。

To ensure the calculation efficiency, ZW3D Quick Mill uses advanced cache control, which includes cache files and STL data. Cache files are used in the incremental calculation and STL data is the basis of Quick Mill calculation. But a prolonged period of use, ZW3D will generate a lot of cache files. Users can use Clean QM Cache & Clean QM Dir to clean these files.
清理快速铣削缓存区: 清理快速铣削缓存区将清除除 STL 数据之外的所有缓存文件。
Clean QM Cache: Clean QM Cache will clean all the caching files except STL data.
清理快速铣削目录: 清理快速铣削目录将删除用户目录文件夹下的整个缓存文件夹。因此，所有缓存文件和 STL 数据都将被删除。
Clean QM Dir: Clean QM Dir will delete the whole cache folder which is under the user folder. Thus, all the cache files and STL data will be deleted.

机床可以通过固定任意方向的旋转轴来实现分度铣削功能。通常包括两种模式：一种用于4轴的分度加工，称为“3+1”模式，即3个线性轴加1个旋转轴，其旋转轴用于定位的；另一种用于5轴加工，称为“3+2”模式，即3个线性轴加2个旋转轴，其2个旋转轴用于定位。打开练习文件“4X_Indexing.Z3”，如下图所示：

Indexing milling function can position the tool axis in any direction by machine. Normally it includes 2 modes: one is for 4X indexing milling called as 3+1 mode. This means 3 linear axis plus 1 rotary axis, while the rotary axis is for positioning ; the other is for 5X indexing milling called “3+2” mode which means 3 linear axis plus 2 rotary axis, also the 2 rotary axis is for posisitioning. Open the practice file 4X_Indexing.Z3 as follows:
4X_Indexing文件
4X_Indexing milling part
分析：很明显，如果我们使用3轴铣床加工，我们无法通过一次装夹把零件所有的表面加工完成。通过零件结构，我们可以很容易地分析出该零件的旋转轴为圆柱体的中心线（如图1所示），可以通过夹紧其旋转轴的方式来加工整个零件。这里我们假设4轴机器的A轴绕着零件的X轴旋转，让我们看看ZW3D CAM如何实现4轴的分度加工。

Analysis: It is apparent that if we use the 3X milling tool, we are not able to finish all sides by one-time clamping. From the structure of the part it is easy to see that rotating the part around the cylinderical center line(as indicated in Figure1) it is able to mill all sides by one-time clamping. So one rotary positioning axis is enough for this case, here let’s suppose that the 4X machine ‘s rotating axis is A whichis rotating around X axis and the part is a casting part. Then let’s see how to achieve the 4X indexing milling in ZW3D CAM.

Next let’s take a look at the main parameters of Swarfcut operation as follows:
1.主要参数
1. Primary parameters
侧刃切削工序主要参数
Swarfcut primary parameters
对于基本设置和公差等参数，在每个工序含义相同，此处略去。着重介绍本工序特有的新参数：
For the Basic and Tolerance related parameter actually, every operation is the same meaning. So here let’s skip it. Here are some new parameters we need to explain
切削深度类型：测量深度的方向。
Cut depth Type: depth measurement direciton.
Z方向等高：表示沿着坐标系的Z轴测量深度
Z-Level: means that depth is measured along working frame’s Z axis
沿刀轴线：表示沿着刀轴方向测量深度
Along tool: means that depth is measured along tool axis
最大切削深度：当创建多层刀轨时，该参数表示每层最大的切深。当留空时，表示只创建单层刀轨。
Max Cut depth: if we create multiple layers toolpath then this value is the maximum depth for each layer. If we leave it blank then it means only 1 layer toolpath will be created.
最大切削深度
Multiple layers swarf cut toolpath along Z level
切削高度：切削深度的限制，仅当切削位置设置为“顶端”时起效。
Cutting height : It is a limitation for depth and only work for At Top option as follows
侧刃切削高度
Cutting height of swarf cut
切削位置：测量切削深度的基准，从顶端开始或者从底端开始，如果只计算单层刀轨，它将定义刀轨出现在顶端还是底端。
Cutting position: we can regard it as a measurement reference for depth, starting from top or from bottom. If we only create one toolpath then it is used to specify where to cut top or bottom.
轨迹偏移距离：用于设置残留毛坯的余量。
Side cast offset: it is used to set up the side thickness of cast part which needs to be removed.
分层偏移距离：类似于XY平面内的刀轨间距。
Side cut depth:something like the stepsize in XY.
步距
Side steps
2.刀轨设置
2. Path setting parameters
刀轨设置参数
Path setting parameters
刀轨样式：设置单向或Z字型样式
Path pattern: set up if use one way or Zigzag pattern
切削顺序：确定深度加工的顺序。
Cut order: This determines the depth cut order.  This can be applied to both Base Depths and Side Depths. (Normally used under the condition of side cast offset)
底部优先：每次直接加工到底部。
Bottom First: Cut down to base (part) surfaces first for each side cut.
侧面优先：每层优先切削侧面。
Side First: Cut sides first on each level.
扇入：指定一段距离，从该点开始驱动面对刀轴的影响逐渐减弱，使刀轴可以最佳的朝向进入拐角切削。
Fan In: A distance from a corner seam (edge) at which the tool will begin to lessen the influence of the drive surfaces on the tool axis so that it can assume the optimal orientation on the corner.
扇出：指定一段距离，从该点开始驱动面对刀轴的影响逐渐加强，使刀轴可以最佳的朝向离开拐角。
Fan Out: A distance the tool may traverse while transitioning from the optimal orientation in a corner to have the tool axis controlled by a drive surface.
切削重叠距离：当切削闭环时，设定一段重复切削的距离，获取更高的工件光洁度。

Cut Overlap: This is a re-cut distance to obtain smooth part surface when cutting closed loops. This distance is added at the end of the cut (retracting the beginning of the cut) at the cut feed rate.
切削方向：定义切削方向，顺铣或逆铣。
Cut Direction: This determines the direction of cut，which are Clime and Conventional.
转角半径：以该半径对刀轨倒圆。
Corner Radius: Fillet the cut with this radius.
3.刀轴控制参数：
3. Axis control pararmeters:
刀轴控制参数
Axis control parameters
刀轴选项：
Axis Option:
直纹线：刀轴总是沿着驱动面的直纹方向。
Ruled lines: The tool axis always follows the ruling direction of a drive surface for ruled surfaces, it is used for the ruled drive surface.
垂直：刀具不仅相切于驱动面，刀轴也垂直面法向并向上倾斜。
Vertical: The tool axis is both tangent to the drive surface and vertically tilted.
刀轴选项
Tool axis options
自动：对于曲线直纹驱动面，刀轴沿着“直纹线”，而对于其他类型的驱动面，包括平坦的驱动面，刀轴将是垂直的。
Automatic: The tool axis follows ruled lines for curved ruled drive surfaces and will be vertical for other types of drive surfaces including flat ones.

Left/Right: The cutting tool follows the corresponding left (or right) side of each driving curve when looking down from the z-axis. The left or right offset equals the sum of the curve offset of the profile feature and the tool radius.

原理：
Phylosophy :
1)每个5轴引导面等值线切削工序在其特征列表中应有选择的驱动曲面，以其普通曲面输入作为切削目标。

原理：5轴流线切削工序需要5轴侧刃切削或5轴驱动线切削工序作为参考工序。这两个切削工序将起流线作用。侧刃切削或驱动线切削也可以有多种深度。中望3D CAM将选择两次底层切削作为流线。

Philosophy: The 5 axis Flow Cut operation requires either a 5 axis Swarfcut or a 5 axis Drive Curve Cut as a reference operation that contains two separated cuts. These two cuts will be used as flowing curves. The Swarf cut or Drive Curve Cut can also have multiple depths. ZW3D CAM will select the two bottom cuts as flowing curves. It is very useful for machining areas between two tilted walls (turbine blades for example).

原理：5轴分层切削工序接受零件或者普通曲面特征为几何图形输入。根据不同的轴控制选项，该工序让用户能将刀具置于各种不同方向，包括与零件成法向或侧切方向，角度为前角、滚动角和斜角。该工序非常适合于以点控制的涡轮顶部加工或复杂型腔精加工。

Philosophy: The 5 axis Side Cut operation accepts parts or general surface features as geometric inputs. Based upon different axis control options, it allows you to position the cutter in various orientations including normal or side tangent to the part with lead, roll and skew angles. This operation is a good choice for turbine top machining or complex pocket finishing with point control.

刀轨设置
Path setting parameters
允许根切：如果设置为“是”，则中望3D CAM将自动定向刀轴，使得刀具可能到达任何“根切”区域。
Allow Undercutting: If there is undercut need to cut, choose this option to allow tool axis to rotate
切削区域：此参数决定了要加工哪些区域。包括“仅内腔”、“仅外部”或“全部区域”选项。
Cutting Regions: Includes All Regions, Pockets Only, Outside Only,
全部区域：表示将会加工目标表面或零件所有的区域。
All regions: means all of the region in the target surface or part will be taken into account
仅内腔：表示仅加工内腔，需要结合刀轴控制中的“控制点”选项使用。
Pockets Only: Just cut the pocket, need to combinate with the option of Control Point in Axis control.
仅外部：仅加工零件外部区域。
Outside Only: just cut the outside of surface or part.
启用螺旋形铣削：选择刀轨的样式是否为螺旋形。
Enable Spiral: If we allow the toolpath move as spiral pattern or not.
刀轴控制参数：
Axis control parameters:
刀轴控制
Axis control parameters
刀轴类型：本工序提供2种以上刀轴类型控制方法：
Axis Type: besides the introduced types in this operation there are 2 more different types :
刀尖分层切削：刀尖确定刀轴方向，刀具与零件面相切。
Tip SideCut: Tool Tip determine the tool axis’s orientation and then cutter side will be tangent to the part tangent plane.
触点分层切削：刀触点决定刀轴的方向，刀具与零件面相切。
Contact SideCut: Tool’s contact point determine the tool axis’s orientation and then cutter side will be tangent to the part tangent plane
控制点：此参数仅用于加工内腔时，刀轴在加工时会穿过控制点。

Control Point
This parameter is used to machine pockets. If defined, the control point overwrites the Axis Control parameter so that the tool axis passes through the control point.
刀轴引导
Axis Guide
5轴分层切削中，刀轴引导尝试定义一些原形类型作为引导面，该引导面与5轴等值线切削中的引导面一样。其主要用于加工内腔（与驱动曲线类似）。

In 5x sidecut, Axis Guide tries to define a few types of primitive surfaces as the guide surface by using the same concept as the guide surface does in 5x isocut. It is used mainly to machine pockets or porting (like driving curve).

解释刀轨引导功能
Explanation for axis guide parameters
刀轴类型：通常使用圆柱面、圆锥面、球面和驱动曲线选项，我们将通过另一个案例来介绍驱动曲线选项如何使用。
Guide type: normally use the cylinder, cone, sphere and drive curve. For drive curve we will use another case to show how to use it.
原点：可视为XY剖面的中心点，选取的法线将通过此原点。
Origin: Can be regarded as the center point of section profile in XY as follows, the picked normal way will pass this origin.
原点
Origin option
法向：如果选择圆柱面、圆锥面、球面等类型，把它的中心线作为导向几何。这会影响切割区域和引导半径。
Normal: if choose Cylinde, Cone, Sphere etc type, regard it as the center line of the guide geometry. which will affect the cutting region together with guide radius.
引导半径：截面轮廓的导向几何半径取决于刀轴类型。
Guide Radius: It is the section profile’s radius of guide geometry which depends on the guide type.
引导边：选择加工型腔还是非型腔。
Guide Side: If cut the outside or Pocket.
引导策略：设置刀轴是由零件法向引导还是导面法向引导。
Guide Rule: if the tool axis guide by guide geometry normal or cutting part’s normal.
原点偏摆：如果将原点偏转，将允许刀具进入半径较小的拐角。
Origin Deflection: if deflect the origin to allow the tool to engage into the small corner.

约束参数 -> 值
Constraint Parameters -> Value
转数/距离 & 距离/转数
Distance/Revolution & Revolution/Distance
“距离/转数”选项决定齿轮移动齿条一圈的距离。因此，在齿轮齿条机制中，距离是齿条节圆的周长。

The “Distance/Revolution” option determines the distance that the rack moves for the pinion to make one revolution. So if it is a rack and pinion mechanism, the distance is the circumference of the pinion pitch circle. The “Revolution/Distance” option is the opposite of it.
机械约束 -> 螺旋
Mechanical Constraint -> Screw
螺旋约束将两个选中的零部件进行中心约束，添加一组能引起旋转和传动的约束关系。该约束不仅适用于螺栓和螺母，也可以定义两个零部件直接的旋转和传动关系。

The screw constraint will constrain the two selected components to be concentric, and add a set of relations that cause rotation and transmission. It can be used to not only constrain the bolt and nut, but also define the rotation and transmission relationship between two components.
我们使用螺旋约束扳手实现蜗杆驱动扳手唇形

Screw

Record the state of the history of the part from which the reference geometry is extracted. When a timestamped reference geometry is regenerated, the part it references is rolled back to the recorded history state before the reference geometry is re-evaluated.

中望3D的动画模块用于模拟产品运动真实运动，实现产品运动仿真和产品装配动画。它的原理是基于关键帧记录不同时间组件的位置，然后按顺序将这些关键帧连接到动画中。

The animation module of ZW3D is used to simulate the real movement of the product for product motion simulation animation and product assembly animation. Its principle is to record the positions of components at different times based on keyframes, and then concatenate these keyframes into an animation in order.
注意： 动画对象是仅存在装配的目标对象。这里无法访问装配以外的动画。您只可以打开装配文件，然后使用编辑动画的命令在浏览和编辑动画。

Note: The animation object is a target object that is only in the assembly. There is no access to the animation outside of the assembly. You can only open the assembly file, and then use the Edit animation command to view and edit the animation.

每个动画都是关键帧不可分割的部分。掌握它们的用法，您可以轻易地创建动画。
Every animation is inseparable from the key parameters. Master their usage and you create animations easily.
下面是对所有关键帧的参数和命令的说明。
Below is the explanation of all key Animation parameters and commands.
时间轴
Timeline
时间轴是您管理所有信息关键帧的地方。在里面，您可以在不同时间激活关键帧，检查产品在关键帧的位置。
The timeline is where you manage all the animation keyframes. In it, you can activate the keyframe at the different times to check the position of the product at the keyframe.
时间轴
Timeline
关键帧
Keyframe
关键帧是当前时间内记录产品位置的最小动画单位。关键帧的最小单位是秒，并且每60秒它会转换成分钟。此外，所有关键帧会自动按顺序排列。

A keyframe is the smallest unit of the animation that records the position of the product in the current time. The smallest unit of the keyframe time is second, and it will be automatically converted into a minute every 60 seconds. In addition, all keyframes will be automatically arranged in order.
关键帧
Keyframe
参数
Parameter
动画参数是驱动产品位置变化的主要变量。通过参考装配约束中的变量，它们可以调整每个关键帧相对应的组件位置。因此，约束距离或角度偏移变量可以在装配动画中作为参数使用。

Animation parameters are the main variables that drive product position changes. They adjust the position of the corresponding component in each keyframe by referring to the driving variable in the assembly constraint. So, constraints with distance or angle offset variables can be used as parameters in the assembly animation.
相机位置
Camera Position
该命令允许您为每个关键帧添加相机位置，这有助于创建“飞越”的动画，因此，通过更改相机在每个关键帧的相机位置来显示多角度的产品。此外，我们可以直接在建模空间调整模型位置，定义其为当前相机的位置，或者通过准确的坐标来定义相机位置。

This command allows you to add a camera position to each keyframe, which helps create "fly-through" animations and hence, show the product from multiple angles by changing the camera location at each keyframe. In addition, we can directly adjust the model position in the model space and define it as the current camera position or define the camera position by precise coordinates.
相机位置
Camera Position

仿真传动产品的真实运动不仅可以防止设计错误，而且可以让其他人更好地理解我们的产品。下面是制作运动仿真动画的工作流程。

Simulating the real movement of transmission products can help not only avoid design mistakes, but also others better understand our product. Below is the workflow of making a motion simulation animation.

Motion simulation animation workflow

运动仿真例子 -- 曲轴连杆机构
Motion Simulation Case -- Crankshaft connecting rod system
案例分析: 曲轴连杆最初是一个驱动曲轴连杆旋转的四活塞连杆，但我们可以定义曲轴的旋转来模拟曲轴连杆的运动。在此前提下，将驱动约束锁定为曲轴上的角度约束。

Case analysis: The crankshaft connecting rod was originally a four-piston connecting rod driving the crankshaft to rotate, but we can define the rotation of the crankshaft to simulate the movement of the crankshaft connecting rod. On this premise, we lock the driving constraint to the Angle constraint on the crankshaft.

Case analysis

动画管理器

重复: 重复播放动画。
Repeat: Play the animation again and again.
相机视野: 通过改变每个关键帧的相机位置来创建“飞越”动画。
View through camera: Create "fly-through" animations by changing the camera location at each keyframe.
检查干涉: 在动画期间，自动检查装配干涉。

动画输出工具
Animation output tool
捕捉: 将活动显示激活到文件。它自动关闭视图扩展阅读、世界轴三元和默认的基准显示。您可以将它保存为BMP、GIF、JPG和TIF图形文件格式。还允许您的图形卡支持最新的像素分辨率。

Capture: Capture the active display to a file. It automatically turns off the view extents readout, the world axis triad, and the default datum display. You can save it in BMP, GIF, JPG, and TIF graphics file formats. It also allows up to the maximum pixel resolution supported by your graphics card.
录制动画: 保存活动的动画为外部AVI文件。

播放速度: 从“每帧”、“1/4速度、“1/2速度”、“速度”、“2x速度”和“4x速度”中选择所需的播放速度。
Playback Speed: Choose the desired playback speed from “Play every frame”, “1/4 speed”, “1/2 speed”, “Real Time”, “2x speed”, and “4x speed”.
运动轨迹颜色: 设置运动轨迹线的颜色。
Motion track color: Set the color of the motion track line.
在干涉处产生点: 在关闭了干涉检查图标（见图178），勾选该复选框来创建一个相交的接触点。
Create point at interference: With the Check for Interference icon (see Figure 178) turned off, check this box to create an intersection contact point.
使用组件光源: 勾选该复选框，使用在当前激活的装配中定义的任何组件光源。
Use component light sources: Check this box to use any component light sources defined in the current active assembly.

目前中望3D有两种文件管理类型，一种是多对象文件，另外一种是单对象文件。
In ZW3D, there can be two types of files: multi-object and single-object ones.
相比于其它3D软件，多对象文件是中望3D特有的一种文件管理方式，这里可以同时把中望3D零件/装配/工程图和加工文件放在一起以一个单一的Z3文件进行管理，如下图所示。
Multi-object files are in the format of .Z3 and unique to ZW3D. All ZW3D part, assembly, drawing, and CAM plan files can be managed in a single multi-object file, as shown in the figure below.
多对象文件
Multi-object File
另外一种类型是单对象文件，即零件/装配/工程图和加工文件都被保存成单独的文件。这是一种常见的文件保存类型，也是其它常见3D软件采用的文件类型。在中望3D，单对象文件类型不是默认类型，需要在 配置 中的 通用 项勾选此类型后才能生效，如下图所示。

As for single-object files, they are commonly used in 3D modeling software. It means that a single part/drawing/assembly object is saved as an independent file. Since it is not the default type, you need to tick the corresponding option in the General tab of the Configuration dialogue box, as shown in the figure below.
勾选单对象文件选项
Making Single-Object Files the Default Type of Files

Note: If you need to work with a PDM (Product Data Management) or PLM (Product Lifecycle Management) system, single-object files are strongly recommended for file management.

草图模块是计算机辅助建模过程中最基本的模块。对于实体建模，绝大多数时候是从二维草绘开始。草图用来创建特征和定义横截面形状。二维草图可以被绘制在基准面或者任何平面上。即使草图不会被作为最终的设计文件呈现出来，但它却常常记录着特征或者整个零件最重要的设计概念。在这一章，最基本的二维草绘的概念，操作将会被介绍。

2D sketches are fundamental to solid modeling because you can create features and define cross-sectional shapes with them on any planar face. Although most of the time, they will not be outputted as the final designs, they often represent the most important ideas of a feature or even the whole part.

In ZW3D, you can create two basic types of sketches. One is sketches that are part of part files, including external and internal ones. The other is standalone sketches, which can be saved as independent files.

In most cases, a sketch is created as a feature in the part modeling environment. After creating a new part, you can invoke Sketch by right-clicking on the blank area and selecting it in the context menu, or clicking the corresponding icon in the Shape tab of the Ribbon interface, as shown in Figure 24. Sketches created these ways are called external sketches, which can be reused for many different modeling features.
另外一种常见的方式是在创建诸如拉伸/旋转/扫掠等特征时，在其内部创建草图，如下图所示。这种草图被称为内部草图，只能被隶属特征使用。

As for internal sketches, they are created during the execution of a modeling command, such as Extrude, Revolve, Sweep, etc. An internal sketch can only be used for its corresponding modeling feature.

You can convert internal sketches into external ones by right-clicking on the internal sketch and selecting Make External in the context menu, as shown in Figure 28.

基于特征的建模是一种将特征视为建模基本单元的模型创建方法，即三维模型可以用各种不同类型的创建出来。一般情况下，模型特征可以分为以下三种类型：
Feature-based modeling means that a feature is regarded as the basic modeling unit and that a 3D model consists of various features. Generally, modeling features can be divided into three types.
基准特征
Datum feature
基准特征通常是指基准坐标系，基准面，基准轴和基准点。
Datum features include datum planes, axes, and point.
基础特征
Basic feature
常见基础特征有三种，它们分别是拉伸特征，旋转特征和扫掠特征。
Basic features include extrude, revolve, and sweep features.
基础特征
Basic Features
工程特征
Engineering feature
工程特征是指因为实际工程需要而创建的特征，例如倒角/圆角/拔模等。这些特征通常都有很强烈和普遍的工程应用背景。
Engineering features are mostly applied to the actual field of engineering, including chamfer, fillet, draft, etc.
工程特征
Engineering Features

There are two types of shapes: solids and surfaces. In ZW3D, a closed geometry is considered a solid, otherwise, it is a surface, as shown in Figure 91. The unique modeling method of ZW3D, hybrid modeling, allows you to switch between solids and surfaces freely. It means that if a shape is geometrically closed, it will be automatically filled and regarded a solid.

A 3D model is usually composed of different types of geometric entities, including points, lines, curves, sketches, datums, surfaces, solid shapes, etc. A complicated model may contain thousands of entities. Therefore, managing these entities properly is vital to a clear view of the model.

In ZW3D, you can easily access layer-related tools in the Document Aware Toolbar.
中望3D的图层功能
Layer-Related Tools in ZW3D
如下图所示，去到中望3D的 图层管理器 中，你会发现已经有一个名为 图层0000 的图层。这是在你创建一个新的模型文件时系统自动创建的图层，这个图层可以被重命名，但是不可以被删除。在中望3D，如果你不创建新的图层，那么所有的几何要素都将被自动放在这个系统创建的默认图层中。此时，当你点击小灯泡图标，则此图层被关闭显示，这时候，绘图区的所有几何元素将不被显示。

A default layer Layer0000 would be created in the Layer Manager. It can be renamed, but not deleted. If you did not create new layers, all the entities will be automatically assigned to this default layer. Also, when you turn off the bulb icon, all the entities of this layer will be blanked.

The Valve Core is located inside the Valve Body and driven by the Valve Rod.
步骤 01 在当前球阀.Z3文件中创建阀芯零件，文件创建步骤与扳手案例一样。
STEP 01 Create a new part file named Valve Core in the current Valve.Z3 file.
步骤 02 创建旋转特征。首先，在YZ基准面上绘制草图。如下图最左边所示，先绘制一条竖线并添加相应约束，然后对其进行镜像，连接这两条竖线段；紧接着以坐标原点为圆心绘制R21.0mm的圆并修剪多余线段，得到目标轮廓；最后退出草绘模式回到建模环境。

STEP 02 Draw a revolve profile on the YZ datum plane by creating and constraining a vertical line, mirroring it, connecting the two vertical lines, drawing a circle (Radius=21.00 mm), and trimming the sketch. Exit the Sketch environment and return to the modeling environment.

在CAD中所有完整的产品设计都是由多个零件组成，但是，在装配级别上，零件通常称为零部件，也就是说在CAD软件中装配件由零件装配而成。

Any completed product of CAD design is composed of multiple parts, however, in the assembly level, the parts are normally called as the components which means the components assembled into an assembly modeling in CAD software.
以下为相关术语和定义。
Following are the definition of some nomenclatures in CAD technology.
零件：独立的单个模型。 零件由设计变量，几何形状，材料属性和零件属性组成。
Part:  The single unit model which is independent. The part is consisting of design variables, geometry, material attribute and part attributes.
组件：组成子装配件的最基本的单元。 此外，当组件不在装配中时其被称作零件。
Component: The most basic unit which consist into sub-assembly or assembly. Besides, the component is a part when it is not in the sub-assembly or assembly.
装配：装配建模的最终成品也可以称为产品，它由具有约束的不同子装配或零部件组成。
Assembly: The final objective of assembly modeling which also can be called product and it is composed of different sub-assembly or component with constraints.
子装配：通常来说是第二级或第二级以下的装配，并由具有约束的不同子装配或组件组成。
Sub-assembly: Literally it is the secondary assembly which compose into assembly and composed of different secondary sub-assembly or component with constraints.
约束：在装配中，我们可以通过约束定义组件的空间位置和组件之间相对运动，然后可以分析零件之间是否存在干涉以及它们是否正常运动。

Constraint: In assembly modeling, the spatial position and relative motion of the components can be defined by constraint, then you can analyze whether there is interference between components and whether they are moving normally.
ZW3D装配管理器中的约束
Constraints in assembly manager of ZW3D

如上图所示，装配在不同层级可分为多个子装配和组件，同时每一个子装配也由不同的组件组成。在装配树中，每一个分支代表着不同的组件和子装配，装配树的最高级是总装配

As shown in the assembly tree above, an assembly can be divided into several sub-assemblies and components in different levels, and each of the sub-assemblies is also composed of different components. In the assembly tree, each of the leaves represent individual components or sub-assemblies. On the top of the tree with the highest hierarchy is total assembly.

自底向上装配和自顶向下装配
Top-down design and bottom-up design
通常来说，装配分为自底向上装配和自顶向下装配两种，这两种方式适用于不同场景的设计需求，在自底向上装配中，需要先完成全部的零件设计然后将零件作为组件添加进装配，如果首先完成的是装配体设计然后根据产品装配体外形去设计相关联的零件，这种方法则称之为自顶向下装配。这两种方式可以在不同的场景下满足不同的设计需求，以下为这两种方法的详细介绍。

Basically, there are two fundamental methods in assembly design, they are Bottom-Up design and Top-Down design respectively, each of them can meet different design requirements. If the design order is: Finish the independent part design first and then apply those parts into assembly, we call it bottom-up design, if the assembly or product shape is first completed and then design the associative parts in assembly, this is called as top-down design. Both 2 methods can meet various needs at design, the detailed introduction is as follows.
自底向上装配
Bottom-Up design
自底向上装配是最常用的设计方法，同时也是最传统的装配设计方式。在这种方式中，所有的独立零件首先完成设计，然后把这些零件装配成最终的产品。

The bottom-up design is the most common used method, which is the traditional way to make the assembly. The individual parts are created separately and then assemble them to form the assembly of a product.
因为所有的组件是各自独立的，所以当对组件进行任何修改时将不会影响其他的组件。此外，在自底向上装配中，组件之间的关系以及修改过后的模型重生成更加容易被管理，如果所有的组件已经被设计好并且处于可以被使用的状态时，自底向上装配更加合适。

Since the geometry of the components is independent, changes to any component do not affect other components. Moreover, it is easier to maintain the relationships and regeneration behaviour of components in bottom-up design. If all the components have already been created and are ready to use, bottom-up design is more appropriate.
自顶向下装配
Top-Down design
自顶向下装配是一种关联设计方法，在装配的顶层中，驱动参数，草图和产品外形可以被定义。设计的流程顺序为从顶层装配到独立的组件，如果驱动几何和参数发生了变化，相关联的组件也会被影响。在CAD软件中，关联更新可以自动完成，在包含关联设计的装配设计中或者在产品的研发过程中，自顶向下装配是更加合适的选择。

Top-down design is an associative design approach. In the top-level assembly, driving parameters, control sketch and product shape both can be defined. Then design process progresses are from the top assembly to the individual parts. If driven geometry or parameters are changed, the related components are affected. In the software, the associated updates can be done automatically. In some assemblies that consists some associative components or during the R&D process of the products, the top-down design will be more ideal to manage the design.
在中望3D中，除了支持自底向上和自顶向下两种装配方法，还可根据具体的设计目标选择两种方法相结合的复合型方法。
ZW3D provides both bottom-up design and top-down design and these two methods can be combined in designing according to design purpose.

在给所有的组件定义好约束后，我们通常需要去检查是否有约束缺失的现象，换句话说，组件是否处于完全约束状态，接下来我们将介绍如何去检查约束状态。

After the constraints has been added for all the components, you may wonder whether there are any missing constraints, in other words, whether assembly is well-constrained. Now, the way to check the status of constraints will be introduced in the following.
在中望3D 中可以非常方便的查询不同组件之间的约束状态，其中最方便的办法是检查装配管理器，如下图所示，在每一个组件的左边都会有一个符号来表示组件的约束状态，这些符号分别是(F)/ (-)/ (+)，他们所代表的含义分别为：

In ZW3D, it is very easy to check the constraint status between different components, the most convenient way to check the constraints status is view assembly manager. As can be seen from the picture below, there is a symbol (F)/ (-)/ (+) on the left of component.
(F) 组件处于固定状态。
(F) means this component is fixed.
(-) 组件处于未完全约束状态，我们需要给其添加合适的约束。
(-) means this component is under-constrained. The appropriate constraints can be added for it.
(+)组件处于过约束状态，存在相冲突的多余的约束。
(+) means this component is over-constrained. There are redundant constraints that create conflicts.
没有符号 组件处于完全约束的状态。
No symbol means this component is well-constrained.

Constraint status

在复杂的装配中，我们很难目视检查出装配内是否存在干涉的情况，但是在中望3D中，我们可以通过干涉检查命令去检查干涉情况，这个命令可以在装配菜单栏下的查询面板中找到。

In the complex assembly, it is hard to visually inspect whether there is interference inside the assembly, however, in ZW3D you can use the Interference Check function to inquire interference, which you can find from the Assembly ribbon tab -> Inquire panel.
干涉检查功能提供了两周不同的方式来定义检查域，他们分别是仅检查被选组件和包括未选组件，以下为这两种检查域的介绍：

Interference Check function provides two different methods to define checking scope. They are Only among the picked and With other components respectively, below is the definition for these two methods.
仅检查备选组件
Only among the picked:
仅仅检查被选中组件的干涉情况。
Only check the interference between the picked components.
包括未选组件
With other components:
检查选中组件与未选中组件之间的干涉情况。
Check the interference between the picked components and other unpicked components.
下图展示了包括未选组件的一个例子，首先选中需要检查干涉状态的组件，然后点击检查按钮我们就会得到干涉检查结果。如下图所示，干涉检查的结果同时展示在图形区域和干涉检查结果窗口。

The picture below is an example of Only among the picked. First select the components which needs to check the interference, and then you will get the result after click Check button. Interference Check

在中望3D 中一共有两种创造爆炸视图的方式，一种是点击添加步骤按钮来手动为爆炸视图创建步骤，另外一种是点击由自动爆炸添加按钮来自动创建爆炸视图步骤。为了获得更加精确和清晰的爆炸视图，我们建议使用添加爆炸步骤来手动创建。

There are two ways to create the exploded view, the first one is adding every explosion step manually by Add a step and another one is to click Add by Auto Explode button to generate self-explosion steps automatically. We recommend adding the step manually to create expected result more precisely.

Associative Reference is mostly used in top-down design. With Assembly ribbon tab-> Reference function, you can create a reference geometry that linked with the external geometry from other components.
现在，我们来看一下参考功能。
Now, let us look at the reference function.
在装配参考中，一共有五种不同的参考类型，它们分别是曲线、平面、点、面、造型。在添加关联约束之前，我们需要在装配文件中先激活相关组件然后选择参考命令，下图展示了参考命令中的面参考，图形区域球阀高亮部分则为选中的参考面。

There are five different types of reference in assembly, they are Curve, Plane, Point, Face, and Shape respectively. Before adding the associative reference, you need to active the related part in assembly and then select the Reference command. The picture below shows the Face reference setting, and the highlighted face on the ball valve is the selected reference face.
关联参考案例
Example of associative reference
当完成参考创建后，我们可以创建好的参考面创建另外一个几何实体，下图展示了用参考面拉伸出的一个实体。
After finished creating the reference, you can use the reference geometry to create another geometry, the picture below is using the reference surface to extrude a solid.
通过参考面拉伸出实体
Extrude a solid from the reference surface
在上图中我们可以看到在参考设置界面中勾选了关联复制选项，这个选项可以使通过参考创建的实体参照链接到外部几何，当勾选这个选项后，参考创建的几何每当参照对象发生更新的时候也会同时重生成，如果没有勾选这个选项，那么参考创建的几何就是一次性的并且后期不会跟随参考对象发生更新，下图展示了勾选/不勾选关联复制选项的两种结果的对比。

As can be seen in the figure above, the associative copy is checked in association setting, this option is used to create reference geometry which associates with the referenced external geometry. The reference geometry will be re-evaluated each time when referenced geometry is regenerated. If not checked, reference geometry created by this option is a one-time static copy. 在装配设计中可能会经常需要更改对象名称，通过中望3D中的重命名文件功能，我们可以在不改变组件和装配之间的关系的情况下更改任意装配或组件的名称。重命名文件功能可以在装配管理器中的右键菜单中找到。

Change the object name or file name are very common after finishing the assembly design, with Rename File command in ZW3D, you can rename any assembly or component and keep the associative relationship between them. Rename File command can be accessed from the right menu from the assembly manager.
重命名装配
Rename file command
中望3D可以根据命名规则自动创建新的名称，可以通过Ctrl/Shift选择多个文件后设置前缀后缀批量修改文件名称。
ZW3D can automatically generate a new name according to the naming rules. By setting a prefix or suffix and changing the file name in batches. Press Ctrl/Shift to multiple objects.
在重命名文件窗口中，我们可以双击需要修改的旧对象/文件的新名称区域输入新的名称进行替换。
You can change old object name and old file name by just double-click and directly enter a new name in the marked area.
在重命名文件命令中更改对象名称
Change the object name in rename assembly
注意：对于单对象文件（*.z3prt），对象名称与文件名称一致，所以当对象名称或文件名称其中一个被修改时，他们都会被一起同步修改。
Note: For the single object file (*.z3prt),the object name is the same with the file name. Whether the object name or the file name is changed, they will be updated synchronously.

中望3D中的2D工程图
2D drawing in ZW3D
当在中望3D中完成3D模型的建模后，我们可以非常便捷的创建2D工程图并且工程图可以自动跟随3D模型的变化而更新。
After the 3D model is produced in ZW3D, the associative 2D drawing can be created conveniently, and it can be changed automatically and simultaneously according to the modifications of the 3D model.

在中望3D中一共有2中常用的方法创建2D工程图，分别如下：
There are 2 commonly used methods to create a new 2D sheet in ZW3D.
方法一：在建模环境下，在DA工具栏 或者在右键点击图形空白区域插入一个新的2D工程图然后选择合适的模板，与此同时，在进入工程图环境后，标准视图窗口自动弹出。

Method 1: In the modeling environment, insert a new 2D sheet by clicking 2D Sheet from Document Aware Toolbars or right click the working area and then select a template to create a new 2D drawing. Meanwhile, the Standard view command will be activated automatically.
创建新的2D工程图
Create a new 2D sheet
方法二：在Ribbon点击+（添加新文件命令）然后在弹出的窗口中选择工程图类型并选择好模板，输入工程图名称并点击确认按钮，这时，一个新的2D工程图文件就创建好了。

Method 2: Click + button (Add new file command) from file title tab, then select the Drawing Sheet in file type and select Template, input the name of drawing, and click OK button. After that, the new 2D drawing is created.
创建新的2D工程图
Create a new 2D sheet

在产品设计和制造过程中，2D工程图是一种重要且广泛应用的文档，尽管它不像3D建模那么直观。
In the process of product design and manufacturing, a 2D sheet is an important and widely used document, although not so visual as a 3D model.
使用中望3D设计的3D产品模型，可以生成关联的2D工程图。当3D模型发生变化时，其2D工程图也会自动更新。
With a 3D model of the product designed in ZW3D, its associative 2D sheet can be generated. When the 3D model is changed, the 2D sheet will be automatically updated.
