在中望3D有许多不同的2D工程图模板可用，比如ANSI、ISO、GB以及DIN。但每个公司可能会有他们自己的模板以满足客制化需求。
Many different 2D Sheet templates are available in ZW3D, such as ANSI, ISO, GB, and DIN. But companies may have their templates to meet custom requirements.
一般情况下，定制2D工程图模板有三个任务。
Generally, there are three tasks to customize a 2D Sheet template.
创建新的2D工程图并设置大小。
Create a new 2D sheet and set its size.
定义图纸格式，包括图纸边框、标题块，等等。
Define the sheet format, including Sheet border, Title block, and so on.
定义图层属性（如需）。
Define the layer attributes (if necessary).
定义样式属性（如需）。
Define the style attributes (if necessary).
任务1：创建新的2D工程图
Task 1: Create a new 2D sheet
步骤 01 从配置->文件的对象模板文件中确认你会用到的模板。
STEP 01 Confirm which template you’re using from Object template file in Configuration->Files.
配置
Configuration
步骤 02  从文件->Templates_MM.Z3中打开2D工程图模板，然后通过默认模板创建一个新的2D工程图。
STEP 02 Open the 2D drawing template file from File->Templates_MM.Z3, then create a new 2D sheet with the default template.
创建新的2D工程图
Create a New 2D Drawing
任务2：定义图纸格式
Task 2: Define the Sheet Format
步骤 01 在图纸管理器中，右键单击图纸格式，然后选项图纸格式属性调用对话框。然后，你可以进行一系列如下定制操作：
STEP 01 In the Sheet Manager, right-click on Sheet Format, then select Sheet Format Attributes to invoke the dialogue box. After that, you can do a series of customizations as follows:
图纸尺寸：选择标准尺寸或在字段宽度和高度中输入自定义值。
Sheet Size: Select the standard size or enter the customized values in the Width and Height fields.
图纸尺寸
Sheet Size
图框：图框的顶、底、左、右的边距以及剪切符号的分区和中心标记。
Sheet Border: Define the values of the Top, Bottom, Left, Right margins of the Sheet Border and the Partition values of Trimming Mark and Centering Mark.
图纸边框
Sheet Border
插入图块：选择存放在相应模板文件的标准或预定义的块类型，或你可以跳过这一步，后面再做。
Insert Block: Select a standard or predefined block type which is stored in the corresponding template file. Or you can just skip this step and do it later.
插入图块
Insert Block
注意：所有2D工程图模板文件放在安装目录的资源文件夹中。
Notes: All 2D sheet template files are in the resource folder of the installation directory.
2D图纸模板
2D Drawing Templates

剖平面类型：此类型与剖面视图类似。选择一个投影视图作为深度视图，然后选择位置用于剖面作为深度点的视图。如果需要，你也可以定义额外的偏移点（类型阶梯剖面视图）。

Section Plane type: This type is similar to Section View. Select a projected view to be the Depth view, then pick a location on that view to be the Depth point for the section. You can also define additional Offset points if necessary (Similar to the stepped section view).
剖面平面类型
Section Plane Type
3D名称类型：该操作与创建3D命名剖视类似。
3D Named type: The operations are like those of creating a 3D Named Section.
显示阶梯线：如果你使用剖平面类型，选择附加的偏移点，然后你可以勾选此项来显示阶梯线。
Show step lines: If you are using the Section Plane type and select additional Offset points, then you can check this option to show the step lines.
自动调整填充间隙和角度：当勾选该选项，时，填充缩放和角度计算基于剖面曲线将被用于创建填充。如果取消勾选，在填充属性表中输入的值将会被用到。

Dynamic hatch scaling and angle: When this option is checked, the hatching scale and angle calculated based on the section curves will be used to create the hatch. If unchecked, the value entered on the Hatch Attributes Form will be used.

插入用于将库中的符号插入到当前工程图中。只需选择文件和必要的符号，然后拖放到你想要的位置。

Manage is used for managing the symbols in the library, such as deleting or renaming them.

If you create the electrodes with the functions in Electrode module – such as Electrode Tip or Electrode Blank, the electrodes get the necessary attributes automatically. That’s why this way is called “automatic”.

两种模式创建电极实体：一种是“装配”模式，另一种是“实体”模式。您可以在EDM配置中切换模式。
There are two modes to create electrode solids. One is “Assembly” mode, the other is “Shape” mode. You can switch the modes in EDM Configuration.
在装配模式中，创建的电极将作为组件使用；而在实体模式中，创建的电极作为实体与工件放在相同零件下。
In the Assembly mode, the electrodes are created as components. While in the Shape mode, they are created as shapes in the same part with the workpiece.

Normally, the diameter of the visual circle equals to the minimum tool of the machine. So if the circle is larger than the gap, the areas should be machined by electrodes.

Let’s take Figure 16-17 as an example, to show how the standard size list works when calculating the final size of the electrode stock.
步骤 01 如图16所示定义变量A、B、C。
STEP 01 Define variable A, B and C as Figure 16.
步骤 02 坯料初始尺寸应为电极头尺寸加上2XB。

e.g. The initial length of the blank L1 = 32.23 + 2 × 3 = 38.23 mm
步骤 03 原点值 L1 = 39 mm.
STEP 03 Round the value. Then L1 = 39 mm.
步骤 04 坯料初始尺寸应为电极坯料尺寸加上2XA。
STEP 04 The initial size of the stock would be the blank size adding 2×A.
比如，坯料的初始长度 LS1 = 39 + 2 × 1 = 41 mm
e.g. The initial length of the stock LS1 = 39 + 2 × 1 = 41 mm
步骤 05 从标准尺寸列表中搜索最相似的坯料尺寸。
STEP 05 Search the standard size list for the most approximate value of the stock size.
比如，坯料的最终长度 LS = 45 mm
e.g. The finial length of the stock LS = 45 mm
步骤 06 电极坯料坯料的最终尺寸应为坯料最终尺寸减去2XA
STEP 06 The final size of the blank would be the final stock size subtracting 2×A
比如，电极坯料的最终长度 L = 45 – 2 × 1 = 43 mm
e.g. The final length of the blank L = 45 – 2 × 1 = 43 mm

感谢您阅读本教程！
Thank you for reading this tutorial.
在本教程中，我们向您展示了在中望3D中如何设计电极，包括如何使用电极模块中的命令，如何配置及如何创建火花图和BOM表。我们希望本教程可以帮助您了解中望3D的设计电极的方法。

In this tutorial, we’ve shown you how to design electrodes in ZW3D, including how to use the commands in Electrode Module, how to config the preferences and how to create electrode drawings and BOM table. We hope this tutorial can help you understand the way to design electrodes in ZW3D.

标准件库设计包含零件系列和库定义，能够加快设计过程，节省研发时间，提高生产效率及减少错误。
Library design consists of part seriation and library definition, which can speed up the design process, save development time, increase productivity and reduce mistakes.
配置库可以让设计人员为同一个零件创建不同的零件属性，变量，特征及标注等多重变化，或者为同一个装配创建不同的零件配置，组件，状态及约束参数的不同版本。

Configurations allow designers to create multiple variations of a part with different part attributes, variables, features and dimensions, or different version of an assembly with different part configuration, component status and constraint parameters.
用户可以轻易地基于配置数据创建或Excel文件定义库。在设计过程中，你可以选择合适的零件或装配重用库来提升效率。

The library can be easily created based on configuration data or defined by the Excel file. During the design process, you could select the suitable part or assembly to reuse the library to raise efficiency.

配置库可以让设计人员创建同一个零件的不同零件属性，变量，特征及标注的多种变化，或者同一个装配的不同零件配置，组件，状态及约束参数的不同版本。在产品设计中配置的灵活性提高设计工作的效率。

Configurations allow designers to create multiple variations of a part with different part attributes, variables, features and dimensions, or a different version of an assembly with different part configuration, component status and constraint parameters. Configuration flexibility in product design gives the efficient design work.
库设计包含零件系列和库定义，能够加速设计过程，节省时间，提高生产效率和减少错误。基于库数据或定义的Excel文件可以轻松地创建库。在设计过程中，你可以选择合适的零件或装配来重用库，提高生产效率。

Library design consists of part seriation and library definition, which can speed up the design process, save time, increase productivity and reduce mistakes.The library can be easily created based on configuration data or defined by the Excel file. During the design process, you could select the suitable part or assembly to reuse the library to raise efficiency.

Bend Taper
折弯拔锥定义
Bend Taper definition
有两种方式（线性/相切）来定义折弯拔锥。 当使用相切方式，折弯边与腹板相切。
There are two methods (Linear/Tangent) to define bend taper, as shown in the following figure. The edge of the bend is tangent to the web when the tangent method is used.
折弯拔锥
Bend Taper
腹板拔锥定义
Web Taper definition
无 --- 只有选中的折弯进行拔锥。
None --- Only the selected bend is tapered.
一级腹板 --- 仅与折弯面相邻的腹板进行拔锥，锥度终止于下一个折弯面。
Face --- The selected bend and the adjacent web is tapered.
全部腹板 --- 对折弯面上的所有腹板进行拔锥。
Face chain --- The selected bend and all the webs in the chain are tapered.
腹板拔锥
Web Taper

模具标准零件定制涉及零件系列化和库定义。定制的模具标准零件库有助于加快设计过程，节省开发时间，减少错误。

Mold Standard Parts Customization involves part seriation and library definition. A customized mold standard part library can help speed up the design process, save development time, and reduce mistakes.
配置允许设计师创建具有不同零件属性、变量、特征和尺寸的可变的参数化零件，或具有不同零件配置、组件状态和约束参数的不同形式的装配零件。

Configurations allow designers to create variations of a part with different part attributes, variables, features, and dimensions, or different versions of an assembly with different part configurations, component status, and constraint parameters.
可以根据配置数据或Excel文件轻松创建库。在设计过程中，可以选择合适的零件或部件以重用，从而提高效率。

The library can be easily created based on configuration data or defined by the Excel® file. During the design process, you could select the suitable part or assembly to reuse the library and hence, raise efficiency.

参数表包括驱动模型的表达式，分为关键参数、自定义参数和次要参数。下面列出了每个参数的详细信息。
The parameter table includes the expression which drives the model and is divided into key parameter, custom parameter and minor parameter. The details of each parameter are listed below.
关键参数：多组数据；面板中的下拉菜单；需要在功能面板中进行设置。
Key parameter: multiple sets of data; pull-down menu in panels; need to be set in the function panel.
自定义参数：应给出值范围；需要在功能面板中进行设置。
Custom parameter: ranges of values should be given; need to be set in the function panel.
次要参数： 重要，但不需要在面板上指定或显示。
Minor parameter: important but does not need to be designated or displayed on the panel.

除普通标准件外，模具标准件包括零件造型和腔体造型。此外，在一个型号中可能有不同的安装条件，例如螺钉的沉头和平头。

Apart from normal standard parts, Mold standard parts consist of part modelling and pocket modelling. Furthermore, there can be different mounting conditions in one model, such as countersunk and flat head for screws.
在本例中，我们将创建螺钉的表达式，如下图所示。
In this case, we are creating the expressions of screws as the figure below shows.
标准螺钉
Standard Screws
如第1.1章所述，在ZW3D中，每一类型的模具标准零件都有一个特定的命令。在本例中，标准件螺钉包括6个表达式：$L、$Org（Type）、$E、$M、$Len（PB）和$THORG（Lm），前五个表达式是必需的。

As mentioned in Chapter 1.1, in ZW3D, each mold standard part has a specific command. In this case, the standard screw includes 6 expressions: $L, $Org (Type), $E, $M, $Len (PB), and $Through (Lm). And the first five expressions are necessary.
对于零件模型：$M, $L, $A, $E, $P
For part modelling: $M, $L, $A, $E, $P
对于腔体模型:：$D1, $D2, $D0, $Len (PB), $Through (Lm), $Thd (0,1)
For pocket modelling: $D1, $D2, $D0, $Len (PB), $Through (Lm), $Thd (0,1)
螺钉的安装方式有两种：当Org=1时，螺钉杯头将会沉入模板中；当Org=0时，杯头将会凸起到模板。在ZW3D中，可以使用条件抑制实现不同的零件状态。

There are two kinds of mounting conditions for screws: when Org = 1, the screw will be mounted as a countersunk screw; when Org = 0, it will be a flat head screw. In ZW3D, you can achieve different part status with conditional suppress.

在这种情况下，螺纹腔体可应用于3种不同类型的螺钉（沉头螺钉、平头螺钉和通孔）。不同条件下的螺纹腔体长度的表达式如下。.

In this case, the tapping can be applied to 3 different types of screws (Countersunk head screw, Flat head screw, and Through-hole). And the expressions of the length of thread pocket in different conditions are as follows.
沉头螺钉: $Org=1, 螺纹腔体长度=$E+$L+$Offset+2*$P
Countersunk head screw: $Org=1, Thread length=$E+$L+$Offset+2*$P
平头螺钉: $Org=0, 螺纹腔体长度=$L+$Offset+2*$P
Flat head screw: $Org=0, Thread length=$L+$Offset+2*$P
通孔: 螺纹腔体长度=$Len+$Through
Through-hole: Thread length=$Len+$Through

In order to get a better system performance, we can use this command to reduce the total number of points in a point cloud according to specified reduction tolerance. 点云Ribbon栏->编辑网格->网格化
Point Cloud Ribbon Tab->Edit Mesh->Tessellate
使用这个命令遍历指定点块的顶点，并将它们相互连接以形成一系列三角形，然后可以将点云数据转成STL模型。中望3D提供两种方法（顶点和均匀栅格）构建STL模型。

Use this command to traverse all the vertices of specified point block and inter-connect them to form a series of triangles, then we can convert a point cloud data to a STL model. ZW3D provide two method (Vertex and Uniform Grid) to construct the STL model.
顶点：这种方法保留输入点数据的完整性，将它们连接起来构建三角剖分面。
Vertex: This method leaves the input point data intact, inter-connecting them to build the triangulation faces.
均匀栅格：这种方法生成一种均匀平面的网格，用以拟合每个小区域的点云数据，然后构建平滑的STL模型。三角剖分的合力顶点不一定要经过原始的输入点。当数据足够密集时，均匀栅格的方法将非常接近原始点的点集。

Uniform Grid: This method builds a grid of uniform facets to fit the point cloud data in each small region, then constructs a smooth STL model. The resultant vertices of the triangulation do not necessarily pass through the original input points. With dense enough data, the Uniform Grid method will be very close to the original set of points.
网格化方法
Tessellate method
网格化
Tessellate
块：指定构建STL模型的点块。不支持构建由一组独立点构成的STL模型，首先需要将其转成点块。
Block: Speicfy a point block to construct a STL model. It doesn’t support to construct a STL model with a set of individual points, which needs to convert to point block first.
方法：指定构建STL模型的方法，包括顶点方法和均匀栅格方法。
Method: Speicfy use Vertex or Uniform Grid method to build the STL model.
只有使用“均匀栅格”方式构建STL模型时，才能使用“假定无根切”“分辨率”“自定义”和“光滑度”这几个选项。
Option Assume to no undercut, Resolution, Custom, Smoothness only available for using Uniform Grid method to build the STL model:
假定无根切：如果输的点数据可以沿着一个方向投射二不互相干扰，这个选项将利用优化的“均匀栅格”的方法获得更快的结果。

Assume no undercuts: If the input point data can be projected along one direction without interfering with each other, this option will utilize an optimized Uniform Grid method for much faster results.
分辨率：拖动滚动滑条可定义三角切面尺寸由大到小，让栅格的引线由粗到细。
Resolution: Drag to slider to define the triangular facet size from big to small, lead in the grid becomes coarse to fine.
自定义：当“分辨率”的值无法满足客户的需求时，中望3D支持用户输入自定义三角切面的尺寸以构建STL模型。
Custom: When the value of Resolution can’t fulfill customer’s requisition. ZW3D allow the user to input a custom size of triangular facet to build the STL model.
光滑度：拖动滚动滑条定义三角切面间的连接由光滑到尖锐。
Smooth: Drag the slider to define the connnection of triangular facets from smooth to sharp.
填充剩余孔：当勾选上此项，系统会根据指定的“最大边数”自动填充孔。如果孔边数等于或少于指定的“最大边数”时会填补孔。否则不会补填孔。

Fill Remaining Holes: When this option is “ON”, system will automatically fill the hole according to specified Max. Edges number. If the number of hole edge is equal or smaller than specified Max Edges number, the hole will be patched. Otherwise the hole will not be patched.
最大边数：指定孔边数，用于决定孔是否需要被填补。
Max. Edges: Specify the number of hole edge utilize to determine the hole to be patched or not.
填充剩余孔
Fill remaining holes
保留: 在网格化后，可能会有一些不理想的切面，从而形成一个或多个分离体。中望3D可以指定需要保留的STL模型，按由大到小的尺寸来删除剩余的部分，以去除不理想的切面。

To Keep: After tessellation, there maybe some undesirable facets that formed one or more separated bodies. ZW3D can specify a number of STL models to be kept and delete the rest in order to delete undesired facets according to the sizes from big to small.
保留
To Keep
删除输入点：勾选此项，会删除用来转换成STL模型的点块。
Delete Input Points: Check on this option will delete the point block which uses to convert to a STL model.

中望3D提供两种方法从点云数据重建实体或重建STl模型重建曲面。方法一使用“拟合面”命令将点云数据直接转换成曲面。这种方法适用于难以通过建模的方式实现重建的复杂实体。另一种方式是首先根据STL模型重建曲线结构，然后通过建模方式重建曲面或实体。这种方法适用于更为规则的实体。

ZW3D provides two methods to rebuild a surface or solid from point cloud data or STL model. One method is using fit face to convert point cloud data to a surface directory. This method suits for complicated shape which is difficult to use modeling method to rebuild. Another method is to create the structure curve firstly according to the STL model, then use the modeling method to rebuild a surface or solid. This method is suitable for a much regular shape.

使用这个命令分析点块上的单个点与通过点块拟合的给定曲面之间的距离。给定点与曲面的距离和用户指定的最大距离范围决定了点的颜色。一个“完美拟合”的点会显示绿色，一个“1/2最大范围”的点会显示黄色，而超出了最大距离的点会显示红色。任何介于两者之间的值将被映射到“绿色->黄色->红色”的线性RGB颜色渐变中。用户可以直观看到不同颜色重建的结果。

Use this command to analyze the distance between individual points in a point block and a given surface that was fitted through the point block. The ratio of a given point distance to the surface and the user specified max distance range value determines the color of a point. A perfect fit point will display as green. A 1/2 of max range point will display as yellow, and a distance outside the max. Range point will display as red. Any value in between will be mapped to the standard linear RGB color gradient of green->yellow->red. Customer can have an intuitive image of the rebuilding result with different colors.

QM远程计算功能，指将用户在本地机器上编辑完成的三轴加工工序通过网络发送到其他个人电脑或者是高性能服务器上计算。该功能使得用户在计算工序的同时，能够编辑修改其他工序，并且可以通过高性能服务器加快计算速度，因为高性能服务器的运算能力更强。

QM remote computing capacity refers to send 3x operations that are completed editing on user’s local machine through the network to others’ personal computers or high-performance servers for computing. With the help of this functionality, users can edit and modify other operations while they are computing an operation and can speed up the computing speed with the high-performance servers as they’re more powerful in computing.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
本地机
Local
指用户操作端的电脑。在本地机安装部署ZW3D，客户在本地机使用ZW3D创建编辑工序后，可以在本地机调用QM程序计算刀轨，也可以通过远程调度主机计算刀轨。

Refer to user’s operating computer. ZW3D is installed and deployed on the local machine, after users created the editing operations on the local machine with ZW3D, they can invoke QM program to calculate toolpaths on the local machine, and compute toolpaths via the remote scheduling host as well.
调度主机
Scheduling host
一般是指高性能的服务器。在服务器安装ZW3D，启动调度程序，并将服务器配置为调度主机，本地机就可以通过网络，将计算任务发送至调度主机，再由调度主机调度分配到不同的计算节点执行。调度主机本身也是一个计算节点。

Generally, it refers to high-performance server. Install ZW3D on the server, after the scheduling program is started, the server will be configured as the scheduling host. The local machine can send computing tasks to the scheduling host via the Network and then are assigned by the scheduling host to different computational nodes for execution. The scheduling host itself is also a computational node.
计算节点
Computational node
一般是指高性能的服务器。在服务器安装ZW3D，启动调度程序，并将服务器配置为计算节点，一个调度主机可以管理多个计算节点。调度主机将不同的计算任务根据资源调度到各个计算节点上进行计算，实现集群式计算。

Generally, it refers to high-performance server. Install ZW3D on the server, after the scheduling program is started, the server will be configured as a computational node. A scheduling host can manage multiple computational nodes. The scheduling host can schedule different computing tasks to each computational node for computing based on resources to implement cluster computing.

毫无疑问，安全是数控加工的当务之急。技术人员不但需要确保数控代码不会引起过度切削，而且还要保证刀轨不会引发硬件间的碰撞，比如切削刀具、夹具、机床工作台和其他机床设备，或超出机床的轴限。

There is no doubt that safety is the top priority of CNC machining. Programmers need to ensure that not only the NC codes will not cause overcut, but also the toolpaths won’t induce any collision between hardware, such as the cutting tools, fixtures, machine tables and other machine equipment, or over the machine’s axis limits.
然而，随着零件结构的日益复杂和加工工序的增多，如何直观有效地验证程序的正确性和有效性，特别是对于多轴加工来说，是技术人员面临的一大挑战。

However, as the structure of parts becomes more complex and the number of machining procedures increases, verifying the correctness and effectiveness of the program, especially that for multi-axis machining, intuitively and effectively is a major challenge for programmers.
为了帮助您克服挑战，确保加工安全，ZW3D的全机床仿真（FMS）功能提供了机床构造器和机床仿真。您可以在计算机上构建虚拟机床，直观地模拟整个加工过程，验证程序的正确性，检测潜在的碰撞错误，确保安全加工，提高工作效率。

To help you overcome the challenge and ensure machining safety, the FMS (Full Machine Simulation) function of ZW3D provides machine builder and machine simulation. You can build the virtual machine and simulate the whole machining process on your computer intuitively, verify the correctness of the program and detect potential clash errors to ensure safe machining and improve work efficiency.
You are a helpful translater, you need to translate the user's input into English based on CAD-related knowledge. Do not add other irrelevant content in your answer other than the translated content.
FMS包含两个模块：机床构造器和机床仿真。
FMS contains two modules: machine builder and machine simulation.
机床构造器允许您通过导入STL文件、设置直线或旋转轴等方式定义或编辑虚拟机床结构，完成虚拟机床的定义，用于机床仿真

Machine builder allows you to define or edit the virtual machine structure by importing STL files, setting linear or rotary axes, etc. to complete the definition of virtual machine which is used for machine simulation.
机床仿真允许您加载NC，零件，坯料和刀具到虚拟机床，然后模拟整个加工过程。它提供碰撞和部件比较，可以帮助技术人员发现问题，确保安全加工。

Machine simulation allows you to load NC, part, stock and tools to the virtual machine and then simulate the whole machining process. It provides clash and part comparison which can help programmers to spot problems and ensure safe machining.

一般来说，属于刀具运动区段的轴矢量应为正，以直接驱动刀具运动; 而属于工件运动区段的轴矢量应为负。经分析，X、Y、Z轴的向量是正的，而A、C轴的向量是负的。轴限是根据机床的物理限制设置的。在本例中，将按如下所示设置相应的参数。

Generally speaking, the axis vectors should be positive to drive the tool movement directly if they belong to the tool movement section, while those that belong to the workpiece movement section, need to be negative. As it is analyzed, the vectors of the X, Y and Z axes are positive, while those of the A and C axes are negative. The axis limitations are set based on the physical limitations of the machine. In this case, the corresponding parameters will be set as shown below.

With the virtual machine ready, you can start working on the machine simulation.
全机仿真是将坯料和刀具加载入机床并仿真机床的运动。仿真过程中的碰撞检查和部件比较可以帮技术人员发现问题，确保安全加工。

Full machine simulation is to load the stock and tools onto the machine and to simulate the movement of the machine. The clash check and part comparison during the simulation can help programmers pinpoint problems and ensure safe machining.

工作树：机床各个部件、刀具库、工作组件和控制器的结构。
Job Tree: The structure of each machine component, tool library, work assembly and controller.
轴：轴的信息包括最大轴行程和初始值。
Axes: Axis information including the maximum axis travel and initial values.
属性： 显示所选部件的属性。
Properties: Display the properties of the selected component.
选择信息：双击可选择并显示在绘图区域中双击所选表面的位置信息。
Pick Info: Double-click to select and display the position information of the surface selected by double-clicking in the graphic area.

The Job Tree, Axes, Properties, and Pick Info
NC程序：通过单击状态列，显示在FMS的NC代码和设置断点。NC代码是由后配置文件ZW_FMS_5X.znc(目前只能通过此文件配置后处理)生成的，基于默认坐标系统。

NC Program: Display the NC codes in FMS and toggle breakpoints by clicking the Status column. The NC codes are generated with the post configuration file ZW_FMS_5X.znc (post processing can only be configured through this file currently) and based on the default coordinate system.
断点： 显示断点信息。您可以单击NC程序中指定行的状态列，设置断点，然后进行检查。
Breakpoint: Display the information of the breakpoints. You can click the Status column of a specific line in the NC program to set the breakpoints and then check them.

步骤 01 检查工件的位置。进入全机床环境后，工件的位置可能不对，因此第一步要检查位置。在本案例中，工件在Z方向下28mm（工件的总高度为28mm）。因此，您需要往上移动28mm。

STEP 01 Check the position of the workpiece. After entering the FMS environment, the position of the workpiece may not be correct, so the first step is to check its position. In this case, the workpiece is 28 mm (the total height of the workpiece is 28mm) below in the Z direction. So, you need to move it up by 28 mm.

Checking the Position of the Workpiece (Front View)
步骤 02 调整工件的位置。在工作树面板，右键单击工件调用工件坐标设置对话框。在Z方向向上移动28mm后，获取原点将从(0,0,-87.9)到(0,0,-59.9)。

STEP 02 Adjust the position of the workpiece. In the Job Tree panel, right-click on Workpiece to invoke the Workpiece Frame Setting dialog box. After you move it up by 28 mm in the Z direction, the Attach Point will go from (0,0,-87.9) to (0,0,-59.9).

STEP 03 Set the work coordinate system, making sure that the origin of the workpiece and the origin of the work coordinate system are the same. In this case, you need to set G54 to (0,0,-59.9) in Machine Tool Register.

通过本章节的案例研究，您将学习到有RTCP和没有RTCP的仿真。
You will learn about simulation with and without RTCP through case studies in this chapter.
在中望3D 全机床仿真模块，如果想要对具有RTCP功能的机床进行仿真，则需要在软件生成NC代码时打开RTCP，使代码能够与机床匹配，从而得到正确的仿真结果。在中望3D中，您可以决定输出NC是否具有ZW_FMS_5X.znc 文件中的RTCP“SYS.MX_RTCP_ON”功能（安装路径：…:\ZW3D 2024\ZWPostConfigs）。

In the ZW3D FMS modules, the RTCP switch option allows you to decide whether to simulate machines with the RTCP function. If you choose to stimulate the machine with RTCP, it is necessary to turn on RTCP when the software generates the NC codes, so that the codes can match the machine and you get the correct simulation result. In ZW3D, you can decide whether or not the output NC has RTCP with the “SYS.MX_RTCP_ON” function of the ZW_FMS_5X.znc file (under the installation path, …:\ZW3D 2024\ZWPostConfigs).
SYS.MX_RTCP_ON功能
Function SYS.MX_RTCP_ON
当SYS.MX_RTCP_ON = 1，输出的NC具有RTCP，可以运行在带RTCP功能的机床中；比如在后置处理器配置中选取ZW_FANUC_5X.znc时，会对应输出发那科系统的RTCP指令G43.4。

When SYS.MX_RTCP_ON = 1, the output NC with RTCP can run in the machine of RTCP functionality. For instance, select ZW_FANUC_5X.znc in Post Configuration program, it will output FANUC RTCP code as G43.4.
输出RTCP指令
Output RTCP
当SYS.MX_RTCP_ON = 0，输出的NC没有RTCP指令。
When SYS.MX_RTCP_ON = 0, the output NC has no RTCP.
不输出RTCP指令
Without Output RTCP
注意：RTCP(旋转刀具中心点)，又称TCPM、TCPC或RPCP，是指使刀具与被加工表面之间的旋转轴保持一定角度的功能。在五轴加工中，刀具点随刀具点轨迹的旋转运动以及刀具与工件的夹角产生附加运动。由于数控系统的控制点往往与刀点不一致，数控系统应自动修正控制点，以确保刀点按给定轨迹运动。

Note: RTCP (Rotated Tool Center Point), also known as TCPM, TCPC or RPCP, refers to the function maintaining rotary axes at a constant angle between the tool and the surface to be machined. In 5-axis machining, the additional motion of the tool point is generated due to the rotary motion following the tool point path and the angle between the tool and the workpiece. Since the control point of a CNC system is often not consistent with the tool point, the CNC system should automatically correct the control point to ensure that the tool point moves according to the given trajectory.

运行无RTCP的仿真，您需要修改文件, 否则仿真结果会不正确。
To run the simulation without RTCP, you need to modify the files, otherwise the simulation results will be incorrect.
注意： 当仿真机床没有RTCP, NC代码直接与五轴机床机构和工件在工作台的位置有关，表示工件原点和机床旋转中心的关系。因此，您需要确认工件的位置，测量工件原点和旋转中心的关系，然后在后置处理中设置指定关系来生成正确的NC代码。这样，您依旧可以获取正确的机床仿真结果。

Note: When the simulated machine does not have RTCP, the NC codes are directly related to the structure type of the 5X machine and the position of the workpiece on the table, which indicates the relationship between the workpiece origin and the machine rotation center. Therefore, you need to confirm the position of the workpiece, measure the relationship between its origin and the rotation center, and then set the specific relationship in the post processor to generate the correct NC codes. In this way, you can still get the correct machine simulation result even without RTCP.
以下步骤将向您展示如何手动修改后置处理并从无RTCP的机床中获取预期的结果。

如何延迟更新标注？
Delayed updates of dimensions?
当修改标注值时，如果勾选了草图延迟求解或手动求解的选项，草图几何将不会立即更新。同样，修改的标注值将显示在方括号[ ]里。

When modifying the dimension value, if the Delay solving of sketch or Solve manually option is checked, the sketch geometry will not be updated immediately. Also, the modified dimension value will appear in square brackets [ ].
延迟更新草图
Delayed Updates of Dimension
只有进一步执行自动/手动求解当前草图的命令，草图才会更新。
The sketch will be updated only when a further Solve Current Sketch (Automatically/Manually) command is executed.
手动更新草图
Update the Sketch Manually
注意：如果你想要在草图上修改多个标注值，建议你延迟更新标注，这样草图几何不大可能被扭曲。
Note: If you need to modify many dimensions values in a sketch, it is recommended that you delay updates of dimensions so that the sketch geometries are less likely to become distorted.

派生阵列: 用户可以派生阵列特征的数目或间距值，有三种选项。

Derived Pattern: Users can derive either Number or Spacing value of the pattern feature. There are three options. 
None – Input the Number and Spacing of the pattern feature without deriving, see Figure 61.
Spacing – Input the Number of the pattern feature, then the spacing (like distance, angle) will be derived automatically, see Figure 62.
Number – Input the Spacing value of the pattern feature, then the pattern number will be derived automatically, see Figure 63.

Associative Copy: Check this option, the pattern entities will keep the association with the original entity, and the pattern feature can be redefined. Use this command to transform a shape by warping face geometry. The modification is not limited to a single face, but work across edges to maintain the integrity of the solid shape. The transformation is performed by grabbing a point on a face and dragging it in different ways. There are six ways that you can move the point on a face. The figure below shows the translate along direction type.

由指定点开始变形
Morph with Point
影响: 指定影响范围的半径。
Influence: Specify the radius of the influence scope.
刚性: 指定刚性运动的半径。比如，R=100表示100%的影响半径。
Rigid: Specify radius for rigid motion. For example, R=100 means 100% of the Radius of Influence.
凸起: 指定过渡区域的凸起因子。
Bulge: Specify bulge factor for transition region.
斜度: 指定过渡区域的斜度。
Slope: Specify slope for transition region.
平坦/凸起: 这决定了新点的曲面是圆顺（平坦）或是尖锐（凸起）。当拖拽零件的角或边缘的点时，这个选项非常有用。
Flat/Peak: This determines whether the surfaces at the new point location are rounded (flat) or sharp (peak).  This option is useful when dragging a point on the corner or edge of a part.

VoluMill工序是中望3D CAM里的集成工序。通过控制材料去除率和避免加工时刀具的突然变向，可以显著延长刀具寿命。中望3D VoluMill工序将助你提高效率，减少成本。

VoluMill for ZW3D is an add-on for ZW3D CAM. By avoiding sharp directional changes and controlling the rate of material removal, it can significantly extend tool life. VoluMilll for ZW3D works with you to get your job done quickly and budget friendly.
显而易见的效益：
The benefits are obvious.
减少70%以上的循环次数。VoluMill工序能减少所有材料的加工时间。
Reduce 70%+ cycle time. With VoluMill, rough milling performance is significantly increased in all materials.
延长8倍以上的刀具寿命。VoluMill刀轨能使刀具平滑、流畅地运作，避免出现方向突变的刀轨。无论零件的形状有多复杂，刀具都能够在理想的铣削条件下工作。

Extend 800%+ Cutting Tool Life. VoluMill toolpaths use smooth, flowing motion, eliminating sharp directional changes. This enables cutting tools to operate under ideal milling conditions throughout, regardless of a part’s shape or complexity.

VoluMill2x 工序参数(限制参数)
VoluMill2x Operation Parameters (Limiting)
注意：
Notes:
VoluMill 2轴工序基于轮廓生成刀轨，建议手工去设置顶部或底部的位置。
The VoluMill2x operation calculates the toolpaths based on profiles, so it is recommended to set the top or bottom position manually.
VoluMill2x 工序参数(刀轨设置)
VoluMill2x Operation Parameters (Path Setting)
%最小摆线半径：当刀具加工尖角区域或狭窄区域时，定义最小的摆线直径（5-45%刀具直径）。
% Minimum Radius: Define the minimum radius (5-45% of the tool radius) of the toolpaths when milling a sharp corner or a narrow area.
% 最小摆线半径
% Minimum Radius
VoluMill2x 工序参数(连接和进退刀)
VoluMill2x Operation Parameters (Link and Lead)
继承安全高度Z：定义是否使用全局的安全高度Z。如果设置“否”，“安全高度Z”选项将会生效。
Inherit Clear Z: Define whether to use the same clearance height as the general one or not. If set to No, the following Clearance Z option is available.
安全高度Z：只定义当前工序的安全高度Z。
Clearance Z: Define the clearance height only applied in this operation.
插削距离：定义进入切削刀轨前螺旋运动的高度和退刀高度。只允许非负值。如果输入正值，切削刀轨之间的链接刀轨会生成在已经加工过的零件面之上，如果输入的值为零，这些连接刀轨会生成在已经加工过的零件面里。在本案例中，我们设置穿越刀轨的进给速度少于切削刀轨的进给速度（见下图），确保加工面上不会留下刀痕。

Floor Clearance: Define the height of the helical move that is used when entering or exiting a cut. Only non-negative values are allowed. If a positive value is entered, repositioning moves between cuts will take place above the already- machined floor. If zero is entered, the tool will drag across the already-machined floor during these moves. In this case, set the Traversal Feed Rate parameter (see the following figure) to be no greater than the cutting feed rate to help ensure more consistent tool marks on the floor.
进给速率参数列表
Traversal Feed Rate Parameter
VoluMill2x 工序参数(高级参数)
VoluMill2x Operation Parameters (Advanced)
启动自动进给控制: 定义自动进给控制功能是否启动。中望3D会根据切削区域和刀轨形状自动调整进给速度。
Enable AFC: Define whether to apply Automatic Feed Control (AFC) or not. AFC function enables ZW3D to auto-adjust the feeds along the toolpaths according to cutting areas and path shapes.
自动调整螺旋进刀、斜向进刀的进给速度：设置这2类进刀是否自动调整进给速度。改选项需要启动自动进给控制功能。
Adjust Feed Rate for Helix/Ramp Plunge: Define whether to apply AFC on Helix or Ramp plunge or not. These options are available when Enable AFC is Yes.

技术专家工具也可用于VoluMill 3x工序。与VoluMill 2x工序里的技术专家功能是一样的。其他VoluMill 3轴独有的参数详细说明如下图所示。

The Technology Expert tool is also available in VoluMill3x operation. It has the same functionality as in VoluMill2x operation. Other unique parameters of VoluMill3x operation are explained in detail as below figures show.
VoluMill3x 工序参数(刀具与速度进给)
VoluMill3x Operation Paramters (Primary)
额外的侧面余量：该参数用于设置垂直面的加工余量。
Additional Side Thick: Additional thickness will be left on the side walls after the operation is done, besides the value set in Surface Thick option.
VoluMill3x 工序参数(刀轨设置)
VoluMill3x Operation Paramters (Path Setting)
仅型腔：该功能适用于加工具有平顶面的型腔材料，能使工件四周的材料不被切削，而且能允许用户不需要另外设置毛坯。详细请看图25。
Cavity Only: This option should be used when machining a cavity from material with a flat top surface. The benefit is that stock need not be defined separately. See Figure 25for details.
最终下切步距：使用该功能可以控制最终的材料高度，加工时不需要通过设置小的下切步距来保留更小的材料高度。VoluMill可以有效地加工更大的下切深度， 然后自动按照最终下切步距来重新加工， 从而留下更小高度的材料。通过这样做，刀具可以最大化地移除材料，同时又保证留有较小的材料用于半精加工或精加工。详细请看图26。

Final Step Height: This option is used to control the height of the steps that will remain. Instead of making a shallow depth of cut across the entire part to leave smaller steps, VoluMill first machine larger steps and then automatically re-machine them to leave smaller steps. Thus the tool can remove the bulk of material most efficiently and still leave smaller steps for a semi-finish or finish toolpath. See Figure 26 for details.
发现平面：该功能可以检测出与下切步距或最终下切步距不一致的平面。详细请看图27。
Hit Flats: This option is used to control how flat surfaces, that are not coincident with any depth of cuts or final step heights, are machined. See Figure 27 for details.

Cavity Only: No              VS              Cavity Only: Yes

焊件，作为设计中必不可少的模块，能够帮助用户提高设计效率。中望3D的焊件模型是一个多造型零部件，但每个造型可以作为一个组件罗列在焊件切割表中。焊件模块包括路径和框架结构特征的创建功能，以及一些基础编辑工具。

Weldment is a necessary module for designing. It can improve the design efficiency. In ZW3D, weldment model is a multi-shape part, but each shape can be treated as one component and list it in the structure BOM. And weldment module includes creation function for path and frame feature, as well as some basic editing tools.
